story:
Bistro Days is a visual novel that will give a smile to your heart. We aim to create a fun, over-the-top romantic story that could appeal to a wide audience, both male and female. To steer away from a simple one-dimensional story, Bistro Days was made to be a more choice-driven, player influenced plot with various endings and storylines.

The Story 

You are an aspiring food blogger in the cozy city of Wisteria. One day, a giant raccoon guides you to Bellflower Bistro, where you meet three charming characters that will prove to be your life's turning point.

Your quest for social media fame whisks you into the colorful and competitive world of InstaSnap and into the doors of Bellflower Bistro, where love and surprises are always on the menu.

With the Wisteria Flower Festival just around the corner, you team up with the girls to prepare a dish for the Cooking Extravaganza, competing against the city's best chefs for the grand prize.

As the festival approaches, get closer to your special someone, building friendships, uncovering secrets, and indulging in your foodie fantasies along the way—all while climbing the ladder to InstaSnap stardom.

What fate awaits you at Bellflower Bistro? Will your choices lead you to love and success, or will it shut the door on your dreams for good?

 

Your choices affect which character you interact with and their attitude towards you.

Your choices have consequences, from a change of dialogue to choosing who you end up being up with.

 

  •  Languages:  English, Chinese (Traditional & Simplified)
  •  Game Length: 6-8 hours, depending on reading speed
  •  Intended Platforms: PC, Mac, and Mobile
  •  Prospective Release Date: April 2021

Features

  •  3 main romanceable characters -Characters have their own secrets and personalities, opening up different possibilities.
  •  15 fully voiced CGs - All CGs will be fully voiced by our talented Voice Artists.
  •  Play as a male or female protagonist - You also get to choose your own name.
  •  Choice driven storyline - There are many, many choices.
  •  High-Resolution Backgrounds - All Backgrounds are optimized for 1920x1080 resolution.
  •  Over 7 hours of gameplay - This could be longer if we unlock the side-stories!

Rewards

 

Follow Us

 

Characters

 

Why Indiegogo

Visual novels are expensive to produce. The hours and resources spent to deliver a high-quality project cannot be understated. That's why we are asking our backers to support us via IndieGoGo.

While resources have already been invested in developing a demo, without IndieGoGo funding, the scale of our project will be greatly reduced, particularly in writing and art. 


Our Team

Voice Artists

 

Other Credits:

Video Trailer - Matrix Works

PV Opening Theme Song - Usagirikuhyo / Audiostock

Publisher - Kikai Digital

story:
FULLY FUNDED IN LESS THAN 24 HOURS! THANK YOU! NOW FOR OUR STRETCH GOALS...

Fishing in Paradise Game 

Realms Games presents Fishing in Paradise -- A Beautiful Small World Relaxing Adventure designed to be enjoyed at your own pace. Made with Unreal Engine.

DOWNLOAD THE FREE DEMO PROTOTYPE V0.1 ON ITCH.IO TODAY

Set on a tropical island, Fishing in Paradise is a single-player game -- although designed from the ground up to be multiplayer ready -- featuring crafting and building, a light RPG system and exploration elements.

You choose your character and craft new clothing and gear as you play and progress, making new friends along the way.

Travel your island and build yourself a home. Explore beautiful environments brimming with life, both above and beneath the waves. And, of course, fishing!

Message to Supporters

First of all a quick word to our supporters -- including folks that can't afford to sponsor this campaign just yet -- any of the below would help so much!

  • Join our mailing list -- so you can stay up to date on the latest with occasional updates.
  • Join our Discord -- it's free and full of great people!
  • Here's a link to our Patreon page in case you want to request a specific feature or join our regular supporters. (hint hint)
  • Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about the campaign by sharing on social media -- Bonus Marks: Use the tags #RealmsGames #FishingInParadise
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools -- Just click the buttons at the top of the campaign! 

And that's all there is to it. Now for a little bit more about our game...

Character Customization

Customize your character and make them your own: 

  • Male and Female human characters
  • Customizable starting equipment
  • Start life your own way!

STRETCH GOAL 1: FANTASY RACES

-- Extending to Elves, Dwarves, Orcs and the Fae (non-Disney type Faerie peoples)

 

 

Tropical Fishing

    Of course a game called Fishing in Paradise would be silly if it didn't have actual fishing:

    • Different environments feature different fish eg ocean, lake, river
    • Bait tailored to fish
    • Fish of different challenge levels

    STRETCH GOAL 2: MONSTER FISHING!

     

     

    Swim the Coral Reef

    Beauty is our mantra -- above the waves and beneath:

    • Dive into beautiful coral reefs
    • Swim with astounding tropical fish
    • Encounter some interesting surprises along the way!

    STRETCH GOAL 3: TAME UNDERWATER CREATURES

     

     

    Resource Harvesting & Crafting

    Fun and relaxing resource harvesting and crafting system:

    • Chop down any tree
    • Mine any stone
    • Craft it your way!

    STRETCH GOAL 4: EXTENDED CRAFTING SYSTEM

     

     

    Lite Survival & Cooking

    Fun and relaxing lite survival and cooking system:

    • Different types of cooking stations
    • Catch and cook fish, crab and other delicious yummies
    • Cook it your way!

    STRETCH GOAL 5: EXTENDED COOKING SYSTEM

     

     

    Tailored Clothing & Gear

    Beautiful clothing and a range of armor:

    • Male and Female clothing, armor and other gear
    • Textured material with realistic physics
    • Wear it like you made it! -- cause you probably did

    STRETCH GOAL 6: WIDER RANGE OF CLOTHING & EQUIPMENT

     


     

    Customizable Player Building System

    Build your own Home Sweet Home:

    • Wood and stone buildings
    • Variety of building pieces
    • The sky is the limit! -- Actually we're not sure how high you can build as we haven't tested it.. maybe the sky isn't the limit..?

    STRETCH GOAL 7: EXTENDED BUILDING SYSTEMS INCLUDING NEW MATERIALS

    ... AND CASTLES!! (WHO DOESN'T WANT THEIR OWN CASTLE?!)

     

     

     

     

    Claim & Decorate Your Home

    Decorate your home the way you like it:

    • Variety of interior decorations including crafting stations and furniture
    • In preparation for future online multiplayer deployment: Building claim functionality
    • Home is where the Hearth is! -- Did someone say crab claws? Yum..

    STRETCH GOAL 8: EXTENDED INTERIOR DESIGN INCLUDING NEW FURNITURE

     

     

     

    Farming & Resource Systems

    Variety of farming and resource systems:

    • Create your own hobby farm
    • Variety of resources and soil types depending on where you are in the world
    • Digging what you see?

    STRETCH GOAL 9: EXTENDED FARMING & RESOURCE SYSTEM

     

     

     

    Upgrade and Expand

    Ability to upgrade and expand your home sweet home:

    • Different materials to make it your own
    • Get the look you want
    • Endless creative possibilities!

    STRETCH GOAL 10: EXTENDED UPGRADES SYSTEM & NEW MATERIALS

     

     

    Exploration & Adventure

    Small open world (we don't want anyone to get lost):

    • Explore anywhere you want
    • Encounter different creatures
    • Adventures await!

    STRETCH GOAL 11: NEW CREATURES & ENCOUNTERS

     

     

    Combat & Magic

    Light combat and magic systems:

    • Nothing too stressful or scary
    • Archery and magic
    • Choose your playstyle!

    STRETCH GOAL 12: ADVANCED COMBAT & MAGIC SYSTEMS

     

     

    ... And A Little Bit More...

    (Let's not get too greedy...) While, like everyone else, we want to include everything under the sun in our game, we don't want to overstretch ourselves any more than we already have!

    Realistically -- based on our current game development assets and expertise -- we can expect to add in:

    • Living villages
    • A wider variety of NPCs and extended questlines
    • Living ecosystems
    • Animal taming and pets!
    • Horse riding -- and other beasts of burden!
    • Key features requested by our Patrons

    Here's a link to our Patreon page (hint hint) in case you want to request a specific feature or join our regular supporters.

    Game Versions & Platforms

    The game will go through several iterations and updates, with various platforms being launched upon successful completion of previous development rounds. Each iteration is likely to look and feel very different from the previous iteration as we refine the development of the game for each platform.

    This campaign: Fishing in Paradise Prototype Demo v0.1 

    Single Player PC Game Launch @ v1 -- First full public version to be launched on Itch.io, followed by Steam and Epic Games store.

    Multiplayer PC Game Launch @ v2 -- Multiplayer capabilities fully tested and deployed.

    Mobile Game Launch @ v3 -- Following successful PC launch, game will be ported to mobile. Initially Android then iOS.

    Console @ v4 -- Pending demonstrable success at other launch stages.

    About Realms Games

    We are a Games Studio that creates BEAUTIFUL MEDIEVAL FANTASY WORLDS to fulfil the dreams of game players and game makers everywhere.

    “TO EVERY DREAM ITS WORLD”

    ENTER THE REALMS @ www.Realms.Games

story:
We are opened 2nd Canpaign and still going with InDemand! Let's check out to pre-order and get Alpha/Beta Access on STEAM!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/dual-gear-tactical-action-turn-based-mecha-game-steam/x/3779912#/

 

Last Chance! We merged Stretch Goal!

We only manage to reach half way of our Initial Goal. The flexible campaign ensured that we still receive enough to give us a chance to continue on! As a backup plan, we set up a new mini-stretch goal. From now, we take this as a challenge to see how much more we can reach until the end of the campaign!

 

 

|PC (Windows)|

|Mac|

|STEAM|

Download via IndieDB(PC)

                                                

***This is Pre-Alpha build under early development maybe have some problem in this version. We keep working with the new version for update soon  ***

System Requirement

Minimum : AMD Phenom II X4/ Intel quad-core Q6600 RAM 4GB or better VGA AMD 7750 or better/ NVIDIA 550Ti or better Free Disk Space 4GB

Recommended : AMD Six-core CPU/ Intel quad-core CPU or better RAM 8GB VGA AMD 7950 or better / GTX960 or better Free Disk Space 4GB

Device Support : Keyboard, X360, Xone Joysticks (Recommended)

 

 

 

Challenge Update!

First Gigantic Mech Boss TRINITY GEAR!

Want to play as the Gigantic mech boss! We have the challenge for you all! If we can raise 50%(30K) of the initial goal by the end of the campaign. This giantic mech will be unlock to your hangar for all backers who's back the full game reward! Are you interest? This playable mech boss is very exclusive with Unique skill, Powerful weapons and Gigantic size!

This challenge need you! become our backer to unlock this special machine! The challenge will end by the end of the campaign! Don't forget we're the flexible funding you will still get the game when the campaign end! Yup, lets unlock them by reaching 50% of the fund.

C'mon Pilots! Support DUAL GEAR!

*TRINITY GEAR is a robotic vehicle with double DUAL DRIVE devices! Produced with very large size compare to other DUAL GEAR! Equipped with massive and heavy weapon!

Also with special weapon!

On the left is The Massive Missile Pack, this weapon has an incredible lock on system. It is designed specifically to destroy bosses! On the right is the Twin Plasma Cannon! 

This two weapon will be unlocked to all backer at the Steam Early Access (estimated to be around September)

How people talk about us!

 

 

  A Communities we has been featured!

 

 

 

 

 

 

DG UPDATE 0019!

Hi Pilots!

Did you know for now you will get 3 editions of the game from each digital copy perks!

Let see the detail on updated images of $15, $20, $30 Perk!

$15 Entry to the Cockpit! After we got a Greenlit we added steam key to all perks! Please see whats you get below!

1.Steam Key and Steam Early Access! Yes, you'll get the key whe early access ready and get all update ultil full game release!

2.DRM-Free copy! This one is initial game edition we set before greenlit. You also get this one!

3.Console platform on your choice! Choose one between PS4 and Xbox One. You will get the code when game release!

4.Digital Posters & Digital OST

Yes! all higher perks you will get 3 editions of the game too!

So we have to present the new perk we just added for your decision!

$13 Playstation Pilot!

Get a Digital Copy of the game for PS4 version with only $13 USD(1,500 Yen) from $19.99 USD(2,300 Yen) on release date! Available for Asia,Japan,USA,EU.Limited for 100! (Very sorry on the right of page you'll see "for 300" text)

This perk you will get only PS4 code when the game release and no more reward and other game editions like other perks.

Alright! More presented! The perk you will be the recruitable pilot! let see the detail below!

 

$40 and $50 Perk! The reward in $40 perk (The Veteran) are on this image! Let see $50 Perks!

$50 Digital Visor Pilot

This perk will let you become an in-game recruitable pilot! How happen when you become the pilot! Pls see the detail below.

1.Get All reward above! ($15, $20, $30, $40)

2.Become a pilot you can recruit in the game. We have an exclusive Avatars for your choice! Only backer will have its! We have more 30 Avatars for you!

3.You can set the naming of your pilot whatever you want!

4.You can put an initial status points of your pilot! We set more status points more than normal in-game pilots. This very exclusive! Your pilot'll stronger and nearly the ACE!

5.Write your biography what you want to show in the game. Your friends and others player can see your pilot! Yes! Let write your awesome background to show the world!

6.You can choose your exclusive pilot can playable for all other players or keep for only you!

7.Choose your Death factor. Replayable or Perma Death! Yes this very exclusive for you and your friends. All player can recruit you and you are very special! Hope you let them can play you again!

8.Your pilot'll available for all platforms! Yes! whatever PC,Mac, PS4 or Xbox One. You will appeared all!

Very exclusive for you right?

 

See the full mission of Pre-Alpha Gameplay


 

 

 

 

 

 

Welcome to the crowdfunding campaign for DUAL GEAR  a turn based strategy game combination with action gameplay inspired from classical Japanese MECH(Giant Robot) turn based strategy games. 

This is our first original game develop with our inspiration and passion about old classic TBS genre and with the love of Japanese Mecha. With your support, we'll make the game be that all Mecha lover and Turn based game lover will enjoy!


 
 

 

Turn Based Strategy X Action

 

Pilot your mech and keep a tactical play by turn based system. The system is the combination between 2 types of gameplay. 
Giving the player experience of the pilot themselves and at the same time, the player needed to think about the tactic and strategy. Making the reaction,  management of resource and awareness of the mission extremely important.
 

Tactical humanoid Vehicle (THV) "DUAL GEAR"

EGE-01 SIDEWINDER

 

EGE-01L ACID VIPER

 

EGE-01L ACID VIPER HOVER TYPE WITH LONG RANGE RIFLE

 

EGE-01 SIDEWINDER TANK TYPE

 

 

 

 

DUAL GEAR is the 6 meters humanoid vehicle for military tactical developed side by side with astronaut robotic technology from  the biggest worldwide cooperation of space development organization to built the orbital energy station "Gaia Belt"(also known as the Gaia Belt project). Trinity Element(TEC), the company associated with the most powerful government produced the first dual gears squad for space orbital defend (Call Orbital Gear at the first) until Gaia Belt was attacked by unidentified terrorist. TEC make the decision to deploy the Orbital Gear squad to intercept the terrorist. Despite their impressive effort, the Gaia Belt is heavily damaged. After the incident, the Orbital Gear evolved into Dual Gear, a surface tactical unit. TEC begin mass producing DG and sold them to the client worldwide, including the PMC.

Movement System

Dual Gear used original movement inspired from Japanese mecha Anime. Several movement will remind you of several classic Japanese Mecha Anime.

 

 

The game uses GP gauge as the energy for the mech to move.  movement such as the regular move to location, dash and boost will consume the GP gauge. When depleted, the unit won't be able to move anymore that turn.


Combat System

The attack system of DUAL GEAR is a mixed of real-time shooting and quick performance(skill, etc) cut scene. 

The game uses a system called Action Skill, which is a combined of two elements. First is the action point(AP), the other is the Generator Output(GP). Every skill will have their own requirement to activate.

for example, the weapon that has huge damage output or ability to hit multiple targets will need 1 or 2 action point and a lot of GP to activate.

 

Like basic classic TBS game, the combat system included the range and percentage accuracy. Both are related with pilot status and any weapon equipped. Skill may have an effect on them too, increasing or decreasing the accuracy, making more damage or have more chance to get a critical hit. 

Turn by turn and unit by unit

From the third-person perspective gameplay, the important of the system is how to order multiple units in the squad. The game limited the of the movement and attack  by GP gauge and action point. While the unit is moving, the enemy within range will attack the player unit. The attacking will stop when player mech stops moving,  this opens the player to plan out a strategy.  Should we attack another enemy or move to the new position again before changing the unit or ending turn. This system made squad and resource management extremely important.

 

Weapons

 

All skill come from the weapon. The player will get the skill from any weapon equipped, which can easily be assign into the skill wheel.  As the pilot become more experience, they will unlock new skills. All DG unit have a capacity to attach 4+1 weapon included L arm ,R arm, L shoulder, R shoulder and plus with some backpack have a weapon built in. Try out the Pre-Apha demo if you want to know how any weapon work!

See how to equip skills !

Example ingame weapons.

Damage System

DUAL GEAR has a durability system set by AP&CP gauge. AP gauge is Armor Power. This is the durability of outer armor. CP gauge is Core Power. it's mean the durability gauge of the inner frame. AP is the first protection before CP when AP is 0, Outer armor will be destroyed. After that the part will have only CP to received damage. The parts will be destroyed when the CP are depleted.

All part and armor are destroyable. When they do, they will have several effect to the unit to the unit. For Example, when the mech lost a right arm, you will also lose the ability to use the weapon on that arm. If the leg has taken a lot of damage, the movement will be slow and consume more GP than normal.
 

Hangar System


 

Hangar mode is the command center of your mech squad. Upgrade & Build your squad, custom your unit, mission briefing, and find the secret story from here. The hangar will evolve (DG part in store, mission quest or etc) depend on your location of the mother base (there are several scatter around the world).  Let see the detail  below about this game mode.

Mech Customization

 

DUAL GEAR let the  player custom their own mech and team. Every DG is composed of five main parts, The Main Camera(Head), Cockpit, Arms, Legs and Back Pack. Each part have unique initial status and role in the game. As an example, the high weight Legs have a higher durability and resistant value. However, it will slow the DG movement down and use a lot of GP when that mech move.

See the how to coloring your DG!



The player can custom the color, add pattern and camouflage of the DG part by part. Don't forget to choose your emblem and become the ace right now!

 

Carrier System


 

The carrier system  is very necessary for all mission, as it is the way the squad enters the battlefield. Some mission will need a land carrier like a big trailer, air carrier to enter the ocean battlefield or The orbital carrier  for the space battlefield. There will be at lease 10 type of the carrier player can choose from. Every carrier will have different stat and ability, DualGear capacity they can carry and even support fire abilities.

Mission System


The game encouraged the player to discover and unlock mission around the world.
Every mission will be replayable, in order to discover new part, secret intel, and hidden story line. The player can also set a handicap for the mission for higher rewards and EXP.

Pilot Recruit System
As a commander of one of the PMC, it is crucial on recruiting pilot. Through the command center around the world, you can recruit experienced and skillful pilot. Every pilot can gain EXP and LV up, gaining skills and abilities as well. The better your pilot is, the stronger your squad become. 

Tactical Negotiation System
This is one of the ideas we are planning to add in the future. When the enemy unit surrendered and is in the white flag condition. The play will be able to attempt to recruit them into your pilot. There will also be chances of getting new parts from negotiation too. The negotiation is counted as Action Skill.

Dual Drive (Deva Drive or CSD)
The system helped the pilot to control the DG. The DD, a device base on quantum computing, worked directly with pilot conscious. The process 90% mapped the human brain, allowing the pilot to be more efficient with the DualGear. This system is related to the chain combination attack that we will release more detail soon.
 

 

 

The key features of the game for initial goal.
  • Story campaign & 30 hours to play.
  • 30 Missions for story campaign with replayability. Several other submissions.
  • Unit & Squad customization.
  • 30 original mech ! and over 100 parts!
  • 60 type of weapons.
  • Super Weapons!
  • Carrier System
  • Armor & Part Break System
  • Character development system.
  • Action skills & Passive skills.
  • Chain combination attack.
  • Huge Mech Boss.
  • Space Combat system.
  • Initial language EN, JP, TH

 

Story

DUAL GEAR is set in  2064, The new beginning of space innovation. The new energy source was discovered in space.  Most powerful nations of the world and various astronautic organization integration to build the largest structure on the earth orbit call Gaia Belt, the photon&microwave energy receiver station from the moon power plant. 

Gaia Belt project affect the astronautic robotic technology greatly, hasten the development of the astronautic development. 2101, the first phase of Gaia Belt is completed and the testing of the microwave receiver begun. Then an unidentified terrorist attack the station. Despite a heroic attempt of the Orbital Gear squad to intercept the attack, the station was heavily damaged. The attack destroys part of the station, causing it an explosion. The explosion causes a chain reaction, destroying several other orbital structures and falling into Earth. The incident leaves behind ruin atmosphere and severe destructive outcome on Earth. The world would need 100 years to recover from this incident.

TEC blame the other organization as being too weak and force them out of the space program. They leave the astronautic development behind and turn to focus on more militaristic development instead.

DUAL GEAR is the result of the Gaia Belt incident. TEC began selling the war machines to military around the world.

 
 

The character system of the game will show the player with 2D artworks. First let see your operators girls!

 

In Dual Gear, their will be at least three mother base! On each motherbase, their will be one operator assigned each! The mission outcome will have effect on how the operator react to you. Good result and following her advice would unlock weapon and several item for you! They will also play an important role in the game story too! They might even join you on the battlefield!

Also let see the common pilot artwork here!

 

Who's want to become our soldier! Alright, We start update about Artworks first. The Visor Pilot !

These are some the exclusive Artworks for the backer who chooses the "Digital Visor Pilot" Perk. We will have at least 30 exclusive artworks for you. More will be updated shortly. We hope you like them.

This perk will let you become the recruitable pilot in DUAL GEAR, with an exclusive self-biography. You will also get to set the pilot stat too. If we reach the first initial goal, We will make your pilot artwork, camouflage and emblem into personal Avatar for the multiplayer mode.

Please follow DUAL GEAR! We will release a main characters after campaign end!

We have an initial goal for 30 type of mech player can use. we'll keep updating the new mech as soon as possible here!  

 

 

First look of the gigantic mech boss!

 

 

See the world of DUAL GEAR by concept arts.

We need your help to make the game better!

This is a reason for us about this crowdfunding campaign.We choose the flexible funding because we are the small size company but run a full-time development with little budget and lack of resource to finish this game. Your support will  allow us to improve the game, as well as developed for all platform at the same time. We hope to make this game as best we can for you all. As well as your support we appreciated any feedback you give us as well.
  • If we made the  initial goal, all feature presented will be available to any platform.
  • Improve the graphic quality better and more solid gameplay.
  • improve and polish game script narrative because we focus on developing better game play. We need more for a better game narrative.
  • Great BGM and Voice Over. 
  • Worldwide Localization

Let see how we need the budget.

This chart demonstrated what we aim to concentrate our resource on. Mostly, we focus on the gameplay, programming, and the game graphic. With enough funding, we can develop the narrative scripts, voice over and BGM at the same time as we work on our main focus.
 

 

Select the perk you want!

Thank for support us! we have hi resolution poster for you and as a thank for helping us, we'll keep your info in our database. So when we have new projects in the future  you'll get exclusive offers from us!

All Reward and Perk Chart! (Updated)
 

 

Stretch Goal (Updated!)

We only manage to reach half way of our Initial Goal. The flexible campaign ensured that we still receive enough to give us a chance to continue on! As a backup plan, we set up a new mini-stretch goal. From now, we take this as a challenge to see how much more we can reach until the end of the campaign!

We merged The Multiplayer Mode into final goal! at $60,000!
About The Mulitplayer
  • "Team Match" Build your DG squad and face an opponent online squad!
  • "Ace Deathmatch" Choose your veteran DG and face off with other player's veterans on online Deathmatch!
  • "Mission Invader" Invade other player story mode! Choose your way! Help or destroy them all!

The Multiplayer need more cost to build them. Especially when we are doing multiplatform. We hope you like and support us to reach for this goal!

September 2015, Our Studio with Japan Asean Centre bring DUAL GEAR first time to show the world! We got a lot of interest and good feedback from players and developers. The Mecha spirit never died!

The Team

We are a 5 man team developer from Bangkok with the veteran developers and the enthusiastic newbie to be this studio. Dual Gear is our  first original game. We hope to bring this game to be the good one of the genre.Thank you for your support and please follow us!


Pongpat Pongsakorntorn/ Art Director, Project Leader

Past project: Deadly Premonition the diretor's cut ( PS3,PC ), Aeternoblade (3DS,PSVITA,PS4), Crazy Strike Bowling (PS3),Enmorph Online( MMORPG PC

Pornyot Pongsakorntorn/ Programmer
Past project: Wicked Monster Blast(Wii,PS3), Crazy Strike Bowling (PS3)

Sukrit Deephanphong/ 3D Artist

Past project: Aeternoblade (3DS,PSVITA,PS4)

Panuwit Satpleng / 3D Artist

Peeraphong Wasaranurak /2D Artist, Concept Artis

Risks & Challenges

We are a small studio with little budget. We run the studio with a little outsource work and separated some of that income into developing Dual Gear. The challenge is that we need to create this game at the highest of quality we can make. 

 If we raise enough fund, we can improve the performance and graphic of this game. We would have a more complete sound dialogue, cutscene, and narrative script. This also allows us to developed this game for all console at the same time. Even if did not reach the initial goal,  we would still continue the development until the finish. Thank you all in the campaign and try out our pre-alpha demo!

    Other Ways You Can Help us

    Yes if you love for our game or you are the Japanese Mecha fan you can help us by sharing this campaign. Tell the world about This game.

See the full mission of Pre-Alpha Gameplay
  
 
 
 


 
Welcome to the crowdfunding campaign for DUAL GEAR  a turn based strategy game combination with action gameplay inspired from classical Japanese MECH(Giant Robot) turn based strategy games. 
This is our first original game develop with our inspiration and passion about old classic TBS genre and with the love of Japanese Mecha. With your support, we'll make the game be that all Mecha lover and Turn based game lover will enjoy!
 
 
 
Turn Based Strategy X Action

 Pilot your mech and keep a tactical play by turn based system. The system is the combination between 2 types of gameplay. 
Giving the player experience of the pilot themselves and at the same time, the player needed to think about the tactic and strategy. Making the reaction,  management of resource and awareness of the mission extremely important. Tactical humanoid Vehicle (THV) "DUAL GEAR"
EGE-01 SIDEWINDER
 

EGE-01L ACID VIPER
 

EGE-01L ACID VIPER HOVER TYPE WITH LONG RANGE RIFLE
 

EGE-01 SIDEWINDER TANK TYPE
 
  
 DUAL GEAR is the 6 meters humanoid vehicle for military tactical developed side by side with astronaut robotic technology from  the biggest worldwide cooperation of space development organization to built the orbital energy station "Gaia Belt"(also known as the Gaia Belt project). Trinity Element(TEC), the company associated with the most powerful government produced the first dual gears squad for space orbital defend (Call Orbital Gear at the first) until Gaia Belt was attacked by unidentified terrorist. TEC make the decision to deploy the Orbital Gear squad to intercept the terrorist. Despite their impressive effort, the Gaia Belt is heavily damaged. After the incident, the Orbital Gear evolved into Dual Gear, a surface tactical unit. TEC begin mass producing DG and sold them to the client worldwide, including the PMC.

Movement SystemDual Gear used original movement inspired from Japanese mecha Anime. Several movement will remind you of several classic Japanese Mecha Anime.  The game uses GP gauge as the energy for the mech to move.  movement such as the regular move to location, dash and boost will consume the GP gauge. When depleted, the unit won't be able to move anymore that turn.
Combat System


The attack system of DUAL GEAR is a mixed of real-time shooting and quick performance(skill, etc) cut scene. 
The game uses a system called Action Skill, which is a combined of two elements. First is the action point(AP), the other is the Generator Output(GP). Every skill will have their own requirement to activate.
for example, the weapon that has huge damage output or ability to hit multiple targets will need 1 or 2 action point and a lot of GP to activate. 
Like basic classic TBS game, the combat system included the range and percentage accuracy. Both are related with pilot status and any weapon equipped. Skill may have an effect on them too, increasing or decreasing the accuracy, making more damage or have more chance to get a critical hit. 
Turn by turn and unit by unit 
From the third-person perspective gameplay, the important of the system is how to order multiple units in the squad. The game limited the of the movement and attack  by GP gauge and action point. While the unit is moving, the enemy within range will attack the player unit. The attacking will stop when player mech stops moving,  this opens the player to plan out a strategy.  Should we attack another enemy or move to the new position again before changing the unit or ending turn. This system made squad and resource management extremely important.
 
Weapons 
   
All skill come from the weapon. The player will get the skill from any weapon equipped, which can easily be assign into the skill wheel.  As the pilot become more experience, they will unlock new skills. All DG unit have a capacity to attach 4+1 weapon included L arm ,R arm, L shoulder, R shoulder and plus with some backpack have a weapon built in. Try out the Pre-Apha demo if you want to know how any weapon work!
See how to equip skills !

Example ingame weapons.





Damage System
DUAL GEAR has a durability system set by AP&CP gauge. AP gauge is Armor Power. This is the durability of outer armor. CP gauge is Core Power. it's mean the durability gauge of the inner frame. AP is the first protection before CP when AP is 0, Outer armor will be destroyed. After that the part will have only CP to received damage. The parts will be destroyed when the CP are depleted.
All part and armor are destroyable. When they do, they will have several effect to the unit to the unit. For Example, when the mech lost a right arm, you will also lose the ability to use the weapon on that arm. If the leg has taken a lot of damage, the movement will be slow and consume more GP than normal. Hangar System  Hangar mode is the command center of your mech squad. Upgrade & Build your squad, custom your unit, mission briefing, and find the secret story from here. The hangar will evolve (DG part in store, mission quest or etc) depend on your location of the mother base (there are several scatter around the world).  Let see the detail  below about this game mode.
Mech Customization   
DUAL GEAR let the  player custom their own mech and team. Every DG is composed of five main parts, The Main Camera(Head), Cockpit, Arms, Legs and Back Pack. Each part have unique initial status and role in the game. As an example, the high weight Legs have a higher durability and resistant value. However, it will slow the DG movement down and use a lot of GP when that mech move.
See the how to coloring your DG! The player can custom the color, add pattern and camouflage of the DG part by part. Don't forget to choose your emblem and become the ace right now! 
Carrier System  The carrier system  is very necessary for all mission, as it is the way the squad enters the battlefield. Some mission will need a land carrier like a big trailer, air carrier to enter the ocean battlefield or The orbital carrier  for the space battlefield. There will be at lease 10 type of the carrier player can choose from. Every carrier will have different stat and ability, DualGear capacity they can carry and even support fire abilities.
Mission System 

The game encouraged the player to discover and unlock mission around the world.Every mission will be replayable, in order to discover new part, secret intel, and hidden story line. The player can also set a handicap for the mission for higher rewards and EXP.Pilot Recruit SystemAs a commander of one of the PMC, it is crucial on recruiting pilot. Through the command center around the world, you can recruit experienced and skillful pilot. Every pilot can gain EXP and LV up, gaining skills and abilities as well. The better your pilot is, the stronger your squad become. Tactical Negotiation SystemThis is one of the ideas we are planning to add in the future. When the enemy unit surrendered and is in the white flag condition. The play will be able to attempt to recruit them into your pilot. There will also be chances of getting new parts from negotiation too. The negotiation is counted as Action Skill.Dual Drive (Deva Drive or CSD)The system helped the pilot to control the DG. The DD, a device base on quantum computing, worked directly with pilot conscious. The process 90% mapped the human brain, allowing the pilot to be more efficient with the DualGear. This system is related to the chain combination attack that we will release more detail soon.

1.Steam Key and Steam Early Access! Yes, you'll get the key whe early access ready and get all update ultil full game release!
2.DRM-Free copy! This one is initial game edition we set before greenlit. You also get this one!
3.Console platform on your choice! Choose one between PS4 and Xbox One. You will get the code when game release!
4.Digital Posters & Digital OST
Yes! all higher perks you will get 3 editions of the game too!
 
 
 

$20: Recruited Soldier!Digital Copies + 400 dpi Digital Posters+ Digital OST+ Digital Artbook+ Digital Strategy Guide Book Everything above and get digital Artbook and digital strategy guide book exclusive for backers. the book include a data of DG, pilots, skill and mission data!
 
 
$30: First Enemy Contact!+Exclusive Emblems + Exclusive Camouflage Patterns+ In game credits Get everything above, plus the exclusive emblems&camouflages we designed for the backers only!You will be in the game credit as well.

 
 
 
 
 
  $40: The Veteran!Exclusive backer build+ Alpha & Beta AccessGet everything above, plus with updated build after the campaign end and also Alpha & beta access (Even earlier than the early access, you get to try our game from the current state to the finished product!)

 
 
 
$50: Digital Visor PilotBecome the recruitable pilot!Get everything above and become one of the pilots that can be recruited in the game. Adjust your personal pilot stat and write a self-biography. The backer gets to choose an exclusive artwork we set for use as your in-game dog tag.You also get to choose whether this character would be permanent death or not.
For full detail again. Please see the detail below.
 
1.Get All reward above! ($15, $20, $30, $40)
2.Become a pilot you can recruit in the game. We have an exclusive Avatars for your choice! Only backer will have its! We have more 30 Avatars for you!
3.You can set the naming of your pilot whatever you want!
4.You can put an initial status points of your pilot! We set more status points more than normal in-game pilots. This very exclusive! Your pilot'll stronger and nearly the ACE!
5.Write your biography what you want to show in the game. Your friends and others player can see your pilot! Yes! Let write your awesome background to show the world!
6.You can choose your exclusive pilot can playable for all other players or keep for you only!
7.Choose your Death factor. Replayable or Perma Death! Yes this very exclusive for you and your friends. All player can recruit you and you are very special! Hope you let them can play you again!
8.Your pilot'll available for all platforms! Yes! whatever PC,Mac, PS4 or Xbox One. You will appeared all!
Very exclusive for you right?
 
 
 
 
 

$60: Physical Visor Pilot+Physical & Digital Copy of the game! The Physical Copy of Console Confirm! Choose one from PS4 or Xbox One! You'll Get both PC and Console physical copies! Also get all 3 editions of digital copies above!
 
 

  $80: Full Armor! Exclusive Dual Gear parts unlocked!All of the item above and an exclusive only for backer DualGear parts will be unlocked in your hangar. Customize your Dual Gear with this unique part!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

  $100: Rooky Pilot Box SetExclusive box for the collector+ Physical OST+ Printed Manual bookletGet everything above. Exclusive collection box we designed for backer, Physical OST and printed manual of the game. 
 
 
 

 
  $120: Commander Box SetPrinted version ArtBook , Strategy Guide Book, Printed ArtworksGet everything above and the printed version of Art Book&Strategy Guide(soft cover) and Printed Artworks! 
 



 
$150: Value Box Set
Original T-Shirt & Hi tech pilot ID card we create very special for you!
 
Get everything above.
Get an acrylic pilot id card(Dog-Tag) with the AR technology. We will create an exclusive app for your iPhone and android. The card will store a data of your mech and squad. You can use our app and shoot your ID card to show your awsome mechs to your family and friend.
DL the app when game release and show your friend the DUAL GEAR!
 
 
 
 

 
$200: Become The Ace! (300 claims)
Get the original art work of your character, an original emblem and original DG skin!
 
Get everything above.
 Along with special Art Work, you'll get the original pilot. Work with our team for your original artwork and design your emblem and camouglage for you. They will be recruitable in the game. You get to choose whether this character would be permanent death or not. We'll print your artwork into biography card insert into your game box! You will also get exclusive Dual Gear personal camo skin.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 


$250: Data Collector Box! (100 claims) Exclusive hardcover art book & Hard Cover Mechanic Design Book
Get everything above.
With Exclusive hardcover Artbook and also the exclusive hardcover mechanic design book. This book will have all pre-render DUAL GEAR, Parts, Weapons and their data. 
 
 
 
 

 
   $500: The Modeler Box (Limited 100 claims)1/35 EGE-01 SIDEWINDER full paint resin model. 

Get everything above.

This perk comes with 1/35 Resin Full paint bust EGE-01 SIDEWINDER. The model has some electronic part to open the light as a high-quality toy. This reward will come with exclusive large beautiful box send to you. We create this perks for the model and toy collector and we need to send the modeller spirit into your hand.
 
 
 
 
 
 


$1000: The Mechanic Design! (Limited 10 claims)Design your own mecha and Your original weapon !

Get everything above. Work with us to design your DG and your own weapon. You will have the option of keeping your DG for yourself or share it to the world! If you create something awesome! why don't you choose to show your awesome robot the world?
**When you design your own weapon it mean you need to design some unique skill! Yes you have a lot of work to do with us!**
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
$5000: Operation Invader! (Limited 5 claims)Design your Gigantic Mech!
**Merged with 10K rewards!**Get everything above. Not only your own DualGear design, your will also get to design a boss unit. A gigantic mech that will appear in the game. Even more, you can recruit this boss into your squad. We will create 3 special mission arc for you, including 1-2 cutscenes for your DualGear. Design your story into the world of DualGear!  
 
 


All Reward and Perk Chart! (Updated)      Stretch Goal (Updated!)   We only manage to reach half way of our Initial Goal. The flexible campaign ensured that we still receive enough to give us a chance to continue on! As a backup plan, we set up a new mini-stretch goal. From now, we take this as a challenge to see how much more we can reach until the end of the campaign!We merged The Multiplayer Mode into final goal! at $60,000!About The Mulitplayer
"Team Match" Build your DG squad and face an opponent online squad!
"Ace Deathmatch" Choose your veteran DG and face off with other player's veterans on online Deathmatch!
"Mission Invader" Invade other player story mode! Choose your way! Help or destroy them all!
  The Multiplayer need more cost to build them. Especially when we are doing multiplatform. We hope you like and support us to reach for this goal!   September 2015, Our Studio with Japan Asean Centre bring DUAL GEAR first time to show the world! We got a lot of interest and good feedback from players and developers. The Mecha spirit never died!  The Team    We are a 5 man team developer from Bangkok with the veteran developers and the enthusiastic newbie to be this studio. Dual Gear is our  first original game. We hope to bring this game to be the good one of the genre.Thank you for your support and please follow us!
  Pongpat Pongsakorntorn/ Art Director, Project Leader  Past project: Deadly Premonition the diretor's cut ( PS3,PC ), Aeternoblade (3DS,PSVITA,PS4), Crazy Strike Bowling (PS3),Enmorph Online( MMORPG PC  Pornyot Pongsakorntorn/ ProgrammerPast project: Wicked Monster Blast(Wii,PS3), Crazy Strike Bowling (PS3)   Sukrit Deephanphong/ 3D Artist  Past project: Aeternoblade (3DS,PSVITA,PS4)   Panuwit Satpleng / 3D Artist   Peeraphong Wasaranurak /2D Artist, Concept Artis


Risks & Challenges
We are a small studio with little budget. We run the studio with a little outsource work and separated some of that income into developing Dual Gear. The challenge is that we need to create this game at the highest of quality we can make. 
 If we raise enough fund, we can improve the performance and graphic of this game. We would have a more complete sound dialogue, cutscene, and narrative script. This also allows us to developed this game for all console at the same time. Even if did not reach the initial goal,  we would still continue the development until the finish. Thank you all in the campaign and try out our pre-alpha demo!


Other Ways You Can Help us
Yes if you love for our game or you are the Japanese Mecha fan you can help us by sharing this campaign. Tell the world about This game.

story:
Project Billy

Hi There! So you are Probably wondering what this AMAZING Low Poly Game is about, well let me start by saying it is an Amazing, Artistic, Low Poly, Zombie, Survival, Open World Game!
Also Project Billy is now in Pre-Alpha Stage and Will be Released in Very Late 2016 or Early 2017 :D

What can You do in it!?

EVERYTHING!! Well, not everything, but a lot of things, as this is an open world Sandbox! The things you WILL be able to do Include:

  • Shooting Zombies! 
  • Shooting Walls! (Yay! xD) 
  • Shooting Cars! 
  • Shooting Innocent Civilians! 
  • Grenades! 
  • Nuclear Bomb someone when you get into the Secret Military Base!
  • Build your own Base in the Desert/Forest/Water/Winter Snowy Thingy or City!
  • Have your own Apartment (if you decide to build your base in the city)!
  • Survive the Never Ending Low Poly Zombie Apocalypse! (In your Apartment/Base)!
  • Drive Vehicles (Cars, Motorbikes, Planes, Helicopters, Boats...)
  • Move through Different Low Poly Countries and Landscapes (Desert/Forest/Water/Winter Snowy Thingy or City)!
  • Earn and Gain Materials and Cash from Killing Zombies, which you will be able to build your own base from or Buy Weapons!
  • Survive The Night (Its when Zombies really get P*ssed of for no Reason xD)

Things you MAYBE will be able to do include:

  • Multiplayer! (Play With Friends)
  • Trains!
  • Employ Guards to Guard your Base!
  • Base Defense Systems
  • Underwater


What We Need & What You Get

What We Need:

Money!! Money!! Money!!!!!!!! xD

Just Kidding :), all we need is a bit of Funding, so we can get: 

  • Unity Pro
  • Employ A UI Artist
  • Give The Programmer(Me) A computer that isn't from the 20th Century
  • Pay for Steam Greenlight

What You Get:

  • The Game!
  • Better UI!
  • No weird Unity Splash Screen and Better Graphics thanks to Unity Pro
  • The programmer will be able to test his Game! (Hurray!)

The Impact

By Funding our Game, You make us really Happy, because we know you like our idea and our game and want to help! It also means that the game will release Sooner! :D

Risks & Challenges


  • No One Will Fund Us
  • Team Members Quitting

Please Remember that You can also Help us by sharing this Campaign :D

story:
When you thought Simulators couldn't get any better, you haven't seen anything yet!

Get ready to be blown away...


The great news is that we’re not starting from scratch! We have already invested a lot, both financially and emotionally, into this Simulator.  This isn’t a request to put money towards an idea or vertical slice, but bring more features and content that complements the franchise.

To put it bluntly, we wanted this game to be every bit as big as the franchise on which it is based. 

Formula 1...


Some quick RAW video footage that compares the sim to a real F1 race car from the drivers helmet view, and also to the F1 2015 Game

1st clip, Real F1 Car,   2nd clip The F1 Super Sim Mod,  3rd clip,  F1 2015 Game for comparison, 4th clip  The F1 Super Sim Mod,  5th clip, The F1 Super Sim Mod showing bad weather racing.

No fancy videos or editing here, to entice you into something that looks nothing like the trailer. Just raw game footage here. What you see is what you get!!!


All New Simulation Features

Driver View

  • Based on the real thing, driver view that will make you feel like you are in a real F1 car. No Arcade like spectator view here.  Only The Real Thing Here...

Real World Road Features

  • Sparks flying around from cars grinding the ground, of course it wouldn't be real if the grinding didn't slow you down a little. Hear the sound of the car hitting the ground as well as rocks bouncing off the bottom of the cars...

Very Realistic Handling

  • Forget about driving without Traction Control and ABS, The cars are almost impossible to handle because they are Beasts. Just like the real ones. even with ABS and traction engaged, you will still have to handle the car like you would a real one

Realistic Down Force

  • Even on fast tracks you will have to use some down force, other wise you will fly right off the road.

Realistic turning

  • Turning gets harder the faster you go. Essentially at times you will have to let go of the throttle and tap the break so you can turn and don't end up in a wall. at 135Mph these cars produce around 2 or 3 tons of down force, making turning difficult at higher speeds with a lot of down force... 

Real Pavement Physics

  • If you go off road into gravel, you will be stuck, you hit the grass, you will loose control over your car, and slide like you are on ice. Each road pavement has its correct handling. So dusty or damp tracks, will not have the same grip like clean dry tarmac..

Real Car Physics

  • You will feel the difference when you drive. They feel like a sim and not Arcade Game.

Special Effects

  • Sparks fly when you grind another car, sparks fly when you grind the road, an explosion when you hit the wall or another car at high speeds. Engine and Break Fires, Break Smoke, Black smoke when you burn rubber. Car Parts flying everywhere, when you hit a Wall, Overheat your Engine, and see your Engine engulfed in Smoke or Catch on Fire.

Virtually Human ai

  • This ai, is based on real F1 drivers Driving Skills and style and of course Aggression. it performs lie it should. It will race you like you were racing against the actual top 24 drivers in the world, and not a substandard ai like most games you have played. Ai has been now more then one year in the making and getting better everyday

Game Graphics and Reflections

  • Amazing Graphics and Car Reflection, that are written with all new Code. Meaning the reflections and the high amazing graphic detail, will be available even on systems with low end graphic cards,  only possible before on High End Video Cards, retaining Frames Per Second. On low End Boards, FPS runs around 30 Mid Range Boards, FPS runs around 45 and up, and High End boards 60 Fps and up. Ultra High Cards, 150 or better FPS.

The Tracks

All tracks listed, will be re done to look realistic including real world lighting

  • Shanghai
  • Spain
  • Sepang
  • Texas
  • Monza
  • Spa  - In Alpha stage, Ready for testing 
  • Austria  - In Alpha stage, Ready for testing
  • Bahrain
  • Montreal
  • Brazil
  • Melbourne
  • Suzuka
  • Sochi
  • Hockenheim
  • Silverstone
  • Abu Dhabi
  • Monaco
  • Singapore  - In Alpha stage, Ready for testing
  • Delhi
  • Korea
  • Nurburgring

All Tracks are being modeled to be the absolute best tracks available on any game.

Awesome Car Steering Wheels

  • Steering Wheels, with Ultra Realistic Led Lights, that include all the same information that the F1 driver sees in real life, you will also see. No more unrealistic OSD's, you will depend on your steering wheel, just like the drivers do in real F1 cars

All new car physics

  • You will feel the difference when you drive. They feel like a sim and not a game.

Rear View Mirror Views

  • When you look behind you, no longer will be over the car. You will be looking thru the left or right side view mirror.

Full interiors and Visible Parts.

  • All car parts are visible such as break disks, calipers, carbon fiber, typesetting, Detail on bodywork that in most games you have never seen before.

AND MUCH MUCH MORE....

To a select few, you will be able to test the sim driving the Red Bull F1 car, that has been fitted and configured with the real world physics engine. Racing as Sebastian Vettel using the new Alpha Stage tracks.

Don't forget, this is a Mod, built on top of a skeleton of the Codemasters F1 2014 game, so you will need to own and install it for the Super Mod to work. Reason for the skeleton? We started doing simple improvements to the game more then a year ago, and a few months ago it became so big it would be almost a crime to stop now.

Of course lets not forget the hundreds of thousands F1 fans that have been disappointed over the years with the game, with the worst let down in year 2015. So we here feel like its our duty to bring joy back to all the players that have been let down for so long. The Super Simulator Mod, essentially only kept the menus photos and other simple things the same, which aren't very important, all other parts will be very heavily modified, using proprietary coding and Image bending techniques, that are impossible to duplicate making this Mod a must have on top of the game.

In April 2016 the 2015 version will be re-coded and injected into the Super Mod making them work in tandem  so 2014 and 2015 can be played in a same session.

Now to back up our claim, this being the absolute best Simulator out there, we are including videos comparing the Mod to all other Driving Games currently out for comparison, that feature any type of open wheel race cars, and some actual F1 Simulators.

rFactor


F1 2015


F1 Simulator , Compare the difference!!!


Game Stock Car Extreme


rFactor2


Project Cars


F1  Simulator, Compare the Difference!!!


Risks and challenges

How funds will be used... 30% of the funds will go to the dev team to completely re code the hard code files, to change it from a arcade to Simulation. Estimated time of completion is around February, This is a very daunting and time consuming task that involves writing thousand upon thousands line of new code. The remaining 70% will be used to setup a server farm including programming maintenance and most of all to support the loads of bandwidth to make sure the streams are fluid.
Currently there are more then 10 thousand players using the previous Super Mod Lite test version, and currently adding new players daily, so there should be no shortage of players to play against. once the Super Mod is released.

story:
ONE LIFE LEFT

Gaming cafe, Bury St Edmunds

It's gonna look like this:

 

We plan to open a new café for the gamers of Bury St Edmunds and surrounding areas, offering free gaming for all ages and all tastes!

Imagine a Starbucks/Costa type environment (but a lot cheaper!) but instead of spending half an hour trying to get their Wi-Fi to work on your phone you can enjoy a few FIFA matches, run a few laps on Mario Kart, throw some fireballs or try to convince your kids that games were better in the old days...

Food and drink sales - hot and cold

Consoles free to play for all, old and new. At least 10 screens with at least 20 consoles available, dependent on budget and premises size

Sofas, bean bags, big TVs, decent food and drink all enjoyed with your friends

Weekly/monthly competitions (FIFA tournaments, Mario Kart tournaments, Minecraft building challenges, that kind of thing)

Swapshop events, show and tell evenings

Private hire for parties, or just for your mates

Even the most hardcore gamers out there have alternative interests so we'll also offer areas for tabletop gaming, card gaming, perhaps even somewhere you can do your college work if you can handle the distractions!

A location for the local artists of BSE to showcase their talents (we'll put your stuff up on our walls, maybe even offer you a place to sell your creations)


What We Need & What You Get

 

Long story short, we need £15000 to start up.

Now we don't expect we're going to just get given that much, but with a hand on our back from our community we can be up and running much faster. Loans and grants etc are all options but this way we'll know we've got demand as well as offering you guys a unique way to be involved in the creation of our vision.

This covers all the costs such as premises, rates, café counter and equipment, decorating, tables, chairs and sofas, TVs, consoles and games, and all the boring legal bits we have to adhere to.

If we hit the funding target that'd be amazing, but we are under no illusions that people don't have much to spare, so we've drawn up some perks for anyone who contributes in any way they can. Chances are, if you're interested in what we have to offer, you might end up spending £20 or so with us at some point, so why not just pay it a little bit earlier and help us be the best we can be!

In return for your contribution, you get a fantastic venue to come and relax, play some games and grab a bite to eat. There'll always be something new going on at One Life Left, and this will be determined by you, the community.

You want a particuar games tournament? You got it.

You want a specific game or console to play? If we haven't got it, we'll get it.

You want to hold your own private events? You got it.

You want something specific to eat or drink? We'll take suggestions and adjust our menu however best fits the community

   

Risks & Challenges


The members of our small team are a former Game management team with a lifetime of gaming and history of working in service-led industries. We are confident in our ability to handle the ins and outs of running the business and are fully aware and have researched the level of trade required to sustain the business We believe we now have a solid business plan which can bring us success, and there's nothing left to do now but just go for it!

The potential for growing the business is huge, particularly around events and e-sports. In time the goal is to open multiple sites and develop relationships with suppliers and eventually become a showcase for new game launches in conjunction with publishers. That's a way off though - for now we'll just make sure we can bake some damn good chocolate cake!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

It's simple, really. Tell people about us! Use Facebook, Twitter, bean tins and string, whatever tools you've got to get people aware of us and get us off the ground.

Obviously, we'd like some of your money too! Honestly, you're going to get SO much more in return than the value of any donation. Let's make it happen together, it's gonna be awesome!
story_txt: ONE LIFE LEFTGaming cafe, Bury St EdmundsIt's gonna look like this: We plan to open a new café for the gamers of Bury St Edmunds and surrounding areas, offering free gaming for all ages and all tastes!Imagine a Starbucks/Costa type environment (but a lot cheaper!) but instead of spending half an hour trying to get their Wi-Fi to work on your phone you can enjoy a few FIFA matches, run a few laps on Mario Kart, throw some fireballs or try to convince your kids that games were better in the old days...Food and drink sales - hot and coldConsoles free to play for all, old and new. At least 10 screens with at least 20 consoles available, dependent on budget and premises sizeSofas, bean bags, big TVs, decent food and drink all enjoyed with your friendsWeekly/monthly competitions (FIFA tournaments, Mario Kart tournaments, Minecraft building challenges, that kind of thing)Swapshop events, show and tell eveningsPrivate hire for parties, or just for your matesEven the most hardcore gamers out there have alternative interests so we'll also offer areas for tabletop gaming, card gaming, perhaps even somewhere you can do your college work if you can handle the distractions!A location for the local artists of BSE to showcase their talents (we'll put your stuff up on our walls, maybe even offer you a place to sell your creations)   What We Need & What You Get Long story short, we need £15000 to start up.Now we don't expect we're going to just get given that much, but with a hand on our back from our community we can be up and running much faster. Loans and grants etc are all options but this way we'll know we've got demand as well as offering you guys a unique way to be involved in the creation of our vision. This covers all the costs such as premises, rates, café counter and equipment, decorating, tables, chairs and sofas, TVs, consoles and games, and all the boring legal bits we have to adhere to.If we hit the funding target that'd be amazing, but we are under no illusions that people don't have much to spare, so we've drawn up some perks for anyone who contributes in any way they can. Chances are, if you're interested in what we have to offer, you might end up spending £20 or so with us at some point, so why not just pay it a little bit earlier and help us be the best we can be!In return for your contribution, you get a fantastic venue to come and relax, play some games and grab a bite to eat. There'll always be something new going on at One Life Left, and this will be determined by you, the community.You want a particuar games tournament? You got it.You want a specific game or console to play? If we haven't got it, we'll get it.You want to hold your own private events? You got it.You want something specific to eat or drink? We'll take suggestions and adjust our menu however best fits the community      Risks & Challenges The members of our small team are a former Game management team with a lifetime of gaming and history of working in service-led industries. We are confident in our ability to handle the ins and outs of running the business and are fully aware and have researched the level of trade required to sustain the business We believe we now have a solid business plan which can bring us success, and there's nothing left to do now but just go for it!The potential for growing the business is huge, particularly around events and e-sports. In time the goal is to open multiple sites and develop relationships with suppliers and eventually become a showcase for new game launches in conjunction with publishers. That's a way off though - for now we'll just make sure we can bake some damn good chocolate cake!    Other Ways You Can Help It's simple, really. Tell people about us! Use Facebook, Twitter, bean tins and string, whatever tools you've got to get people aware of us and get us off the ground.Obviously, we'd like some of your money too! Honestly, you're going to get SO much more in return than the value of any donation. Let's make it happen together, it's gonna be awesome!

story:
Myself Mandeep Dhalor and i am having 6 years of experience in gaming industry. We work under a name "Ommzi Solutions Private Limited". I with my team developed the phase 1 of this game that is available on "Playstore" and "AppStore" in very short period of time. We are a small family of gamers who work together very passionately for creating awesome games. "Gaming is our passion and we live for it". The game "SardaarJi" and "SardaarJi On Bullet" is very close to us as we have worked very hard on it to deliver it to all over the world. We haven't get any chance to implement more creative ideas in the game because of some issues. Now we want to make this game SardaarJi International in which we want to represent culture of different countries. Right know we are representing some parts of India but we want to move Internationally. We have amazing concepts, Ideas and stories that we want to implement in this game, so this is the reason i am having this campaign to gather some funds so that i can work wit my team on it for next 4 to 5 months to take this game to international level.  We want to make this game more interesting by introducing more characters, powers, levels in it.

I will be needing a funding of 45,000$ for this game that i will consume very transparently. Following will be the breakup of the funding:

- 2 Developer and designer will work on it for next 5 months and each resource will cost 2500$ a month which leads to 5000$ for 2. So the total cost for next 4 months will be 30,000$.

- 5000$ i have to spent on to buys some software license.

- 10,000$ i will spend on Marketing of the game so that i will reach to every user all over the world.

In the marketing campaign we arrange some live competitions to get the reviews from the user and we will also distribute some gifts like merchandise T shirts, Mugs, Caps etc.

We will not waste a single penny of the funds that we will gather from this campaign. Even we will donate from ourselves also just to make this game successful as this is our dream and we want to make it true.


    We are trying to create a fun loving game that can be played by every aged user that can be a user from age 3 to 100. So the game is not age specific and it can be enjoyed buy any user in the world. We are trying to represent the best places of the word (Including 7 wonders)  into our game so that an user can experience the feel the existence of those amazing places in a fun way from there mobile phones. So basically an user can have a fun loving world tour while playing this game.

    We got very good response on SardaarJi. It is next to reach 100k downloads with a rating of 4.4 Stars in 4 months. We feel blessed that we get this kind of response from the user and now we want to return them the best as we can give.

    We just want to represent our Ideas to the world so that we can gain the trust, love and support of the people from all over the world.


    We never do anything without any kind of planning. We want to develop this game with transparency so that every user can follow up the progress for this game. Following are some suitable ways of development that we will follow during the development of the game:


    - We will create a Facebook page in which we will upload the regular progress of the game and will share the link of that page publicly.

    - We always work with a proper project plan. We will create a project plan with milestones and then we will make it live on the official website of the game. The project plan will be available publicly so that any user in world who has donated a single penny for this game will be a part of this game during the development and can chase the regular progress.

    - We will also provide a channel of communication of users of all over the word with developers. We will create a Review/Suggestion column in the Official website where any user from the world can share there idea's for the game.

    So basically the game will be developed from our ideas and the ideas of every user in the world. This process will lead us to decide best for this game.

    Indiegogo has provided us the platform where we can at least give an attempt to make our dream come true. 
    We request all users who are reading this to contribute by donating or you can also contribute in it by sharing on your Facebook wall and on any other Social networking sites.
    Please support us so that we can develop an awesome game together.
    Special thanks to INDIEGOGO.COM

story:
What are we doing?

Aurora Gaming is a newly founded Virtual Reality Gaming Lounge based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

We specialize in creating the most immersive and engaging gaming moments you'll ever have, by transforming the current sit and stare gaming setup into something incredibly interactive!

We've been investing and experimenting with different hardware to find what will be the best possible experience for everyone.

Where will we be located?

We have secured a location in Downtown Dubai very near the Burj Khalifa. Its currently just a shell and we have to completely fit it out. We have a great plan for it!
This is the front entrance.

If you turn to the right this is what you'll see!! The biggest tower in the world!! We're right beside one of Dubai's most iconic structures.


If you look below you can see exactly what we're dealing with inside as its just a grey box. We have to fix and paint all the walls, replace most of the floor and also put up all the pods for the active experiences.

We want to completely fit it out for loads of great experiences and a social space as well so you can watch your friends play!

Take a look at where we envision our social space to be.

and what we'd like it to look like...


The Aurora Experience

We want to have at least 3 different types of experiences available. We are currently focusing on having racing, seated and active. All of them will be using new head mounted displays for virtual reality.

The racing experience will have a specialized racing seat, racing wheel and pedals for that really immersive driving experience.


The seated experience will have a 360 degree turning chair for people to turn around fully with wireless controllers. A fully untethered experience!


The active experience will include a treadmill, wireless controllers or a gun controller, and feedback vests.

Please note that all of our designs are for illustrative purposes and are not always indicative of the equipment we'll use.

Each experience will feature an HD capture card and HD camera to not only capture the game but also capture you while playing the game. It will be all be streamed up onto our social space for everyone to watch. Then take it away with you afterwards so you can watch it all again or even better have us upload it to your personal AG storage so you can just share it with a click.


Why are we doing an Indiegogo campaign?

We have invested a lot of time, effort and money into investigating what works well for a gaming environment by investing into new technologies. We have taken the time to build up our partnerships and get to know the companies involved in the new Virtual Reality movement.

We now need that push to set it all up in the vision that we see fit. We want to do it our way in the vision that we have built. If we go out to investors we have to take them into consideration when we make changes or move to fit new technologies. If we can succeed in our Indiegogo campaign it will keep the direction of the company completely within our control.

Perks

Everyone who donates will be put onto our perk wall to show your support for us.
All the perks below $100 are different rewards based upon what people would like.
Everything above $100 will include the rewards below this. Each person will get a t-shirt and polo along with our USB showing that they supported us in our campaign.
T-shirts and polos will come in all sizes. We'll gather up the sizes after the campaign ends. The designs of these will be posted shortly.
