story:
This is a game about a woman who must explore her past to overcome death and fight to come back to the land of the living.

I will be streaming almost every step development of the project from the prototype stage I am at now to completion, other than voice acting and story events. If enough money is raised, I will record every stream and upload them to a youtube channel.

An underground station acts as death's domain as you are stuck in a limbo between life and death.

 

After her premature death at a young age Aurora is given a second chance. She must use the skills she has learnt from her life to defeat death and escape limbo. Navigating the underground station, a gate way between life and death, Aurora fights to ascend and re-join the land of the living.

You will unlock skills as you progress through the game. These skills will allow you to follow certain paths and without them you not be able to pass. There is a basic skill tree, weapon dynamics, different movement skills and more!

A huge tool will be the use of your torch. Clearly there will be areas it will be your only light source, however it is much more key than that as you will see.

I'm Chris, a programmer that has a true passion for making video games. I have been working on prototyping this game for a few months to see if it was doable as a solo project.

I have asked some friends to voice-act and assist with the story-line.

story:
”Absence Of evidence Is The Evidence Of Absence.

What if you have just FAILED to find the Evidence?"

So, What Is Mystery Puzzle Hunt?

Mystery Puzzle Hunt is a story-driven Puzzle Hunt Video game which combines the essence of traditional Puzzle Hunt and Science Fiction Story Elements.

The game contains 10 chapters i.e 10 Puzzle hunts and each Puzzle Hunt contains 10 puzzles. The element of puzzle is be based on (but not limited to) History, Cryptograms, Steganographic Pictures, Riddles and Metaphors.

Unlike from the Current Gaming scenario, this game encourages Players to use Real Life Research in order to solve the Puzzle Hunts. So, one is free to use any available resources like Internet, Encyclopedias, Books, Library, and absolutely anything!

The Game will be available on Windows, Mac, Linux, Web, Android and iOS.

When you need to Solve something and the REAL WORLD is your Resource

Some tools inside the Game -
Magnifying Glass to see the smallest details of the Pictures.
- A (sandbox) Computer! And Email Client, Photo Editor, and Notes
- Submit Answers using (sandbox) Email Client. Contact with your leads there.
- Decode Steganographic Images using Photo Editor
- Write down your clues, leads, and progress in the Notes

AND, whatever you have outside the Game
The Internet, Encyclopedias, Library, Professors and even News Papers!


Plot of the Game

You got a Document from an unknown person. When you opened that document, you learned about a person with the alias Dr. Quantum. In his writings, he proposed you to solve the puzzles.

According to him, the puzzles will lead to some “Secret Thing” that Dr. Quantum has hidden somewhere. But he is very skeptic about you and will test you every time. And also, he is not very clear and always talks in limited phrases.

It seems that Dr. Quantum wants you to know the truth about some Secret Research Organization. But he is not very clear and always talks in limited phrases because he believes that they are listening to the conversation between you and him.



Want to Test the Game Idea before Contributing?

It is always better to see it before believing.
You can play a fully functional prototype HERE.



But, Why We Need Funding?

The main purpose of this Campaign is not just to raise money for the development, but to reach you people. I want to reach to all Gamers who wants to play a Puzzle Hunt video game but still dreams to feel like “Real Puzzle Solver and Explorer”.

As, this project is one of my dream so the Game will be delivered even if it raises nothing. But, yes! money can make it better and faster.

The game will be completely created by us (i.e No modules would be Outsourced). And, so around $500 would help us to work on this project on a full-time basis for a month. It rounds up the cost of Research, Story Scripts, Testing, Deployment ,Cut-Scenes and 3D/2D Art.

But if (hopefully), the campaign raises more, then we would think of hiring Freelance Translators so that we can port the Game for Different Languages like Spanish, Russian and French.



About Perks

It’s always good when you get something in return for your valuable Contribution. So, we decided some “Perks” that will be a type of a “Thank you” from us.

There are some conditions for some specific Perks where Contributors can send their content, ideas, photos to us. We will review them before implementing it in the Game. In case we find any Unrelated, Illegal, Sensitive, Copyrighted content then we will contact you and help you to choose something better.


Risk and Challenges

Apart from serious Injuries, Natural Disaster and The END of the WORLD, there are two Challenges in the path of Development.
1) When Indiegogo Funding Fails
2) When the Project is at Dead End due to the lack of Funding or Gamer's Support.

I'll carry out the development with my savings while removing some Expensive Modules from the Game. Also, we are experienced in dealing with Lack of Support from the Audience.

But in case, the campaign fails then the project will still be delivered but without Cut-Scenes and Graphics Enhancements.

Who are We and Why we are Creating this?

We are two people. I do the development and my friend does the Marketing. 6 Months ago I left my Job to create some Great Games that I always dreamed of.

2 Months ago I got a wild idea about creating a Puzzle Hunt Game where the player would need to use Google to do the research and get the clues. Then, I developed a prototype in 2 days then gave it to 4 Friends. They all got excited and thus I got the motivation to create this game.

Last month I created, deleted, iterated various models and then I ended up creating something like right now.

There is Always more than One Way to Contribute

The game itself is based on using whatever resources you have to solve the Puzzle Hunt.


So, we just need support. Any kind of Support.
You can still help us by:-
- Sharing this Campaign with your friends ;)
- Greenlight the Game in Steam
- Subscribe to our Facebook and Twitter Page
- Even dropping a Comment/Review is valuable for us ;)



To hear more about the Game, visit the Official Website or drop a mail on hybriona@gmail.com

”Absence Of evidence Is The Evidence Of Absence.
What if you have just FAILED to find the Evidence?"

So, What Is Mystery Puzzle Hunt?Mystery Puzzle Hunt is a story-driven Puzzle Hunt Video game which combines the essence of traditional Puzzle Hunt and Science Fiction Story Elements.

The game contains 10 chapters i.e 10 Puzzle hunts and each Puzzle Hunt contains 10 puzzles. The element of puzzle is be based on (but not limited to) History, Cryptograms, Steganographic Pictures, Riddles and Metaphors.Unlike from the Current Gaming scenario, this game encourages Players to use Real Life Research in order to solve the Puzzle Hunts. So, one is free to use any available resources like Internet, Encyclopedias, Books, Library, and absolutely anything!

The Game will be available on Windows, Mac, Linux, Web, Android and iOS.When you need to Solve something and the REAL WORLD is your ResourceSome tools inside the Game
- Magnifying Glass to see the smallest details of the Pictures.
- A (sandbox) Computer! And Email Client, Photo Editor, and Notes- Submit Answers using (sandbox) Email Client. Contact with your leads there.
- Decode Steganographic Images using Photo Editor
- Write down your clues, leads, and progress in the Notes

AND, whatever you have outside the Game
The Internet, Encyclopedias, Library, Professors and even News Papers!
Plot of the Game
You got a Document from an unknown person. When you opened that document, you learned about a person with the alias Dr. Quantum. In his writings, he proposed you to solve the puzzles.
According to him, the puzzles will lead to some “Secret Thing” that Dr. Quantum has hidden somewhere. But he is very skeptic about you and will test you every time. And also, he is not very clear and always talks in limited phrases.It seems that Dr. Quantum wants you to know the truth about some Secret Research Organization. But he is not very clear and always talks in limited phrases because he believes that they are listening to the conversation between you and him.
Want to Test the Game Idea before Contributing?
It is always better to see it before believing.You can play a fully functional prototype HERE.



But, Why We Need Funding?
The main purpose of this Campaign is not just to raise money for the development, but to reach you people. I want to reach to all Gamers who wants to play a Puzzle Hunt video game but still dreams to feel like “Real Puzzle Solver and Explorer”.As, this project is one of my dream so the Game will be delivered even if it raises nothing. But, yes! money can make it better and faster. The game will be completely created by us (i.e No modules would be Outsourced).

And, so around $500 would help us to work on this project on a full-time basis for a month. It rounds up the cost of Research, Story Scripts, Testing, Deployment ,Cut-Scenes and 3D/2D Art.

But if (hopefully), the campaign raises more, then we would think of hiring Freelance Translators so that we can port the Game for Different Languages like Spanish, Russian and French.

About Perks
It’s always good when you get something in return for your valuable Contribution. So, we decided some “Perks” that will be a type of a “Thank you” from us.

There are some conditions for some specific Perks where Contributors can send their content, ideas, photos to us. We will review them before implementing it in the Game. In case we find any Unrelated, Illegal, Sensitive, Copyrighted content then we will contact you and help you to choose something better.


Risk and ChallengesApart from serious Injuries, Natural Disaster and The END of the WORLD, there are two Challenges in the path of Development.1) When Indiegogo Funding Fails2) When the Project is at Dead End due to the lack of Funding or Gamer's Support.I'll carry out the development with my savings while removing some Expensive Modules from the Game. Also, we are experienced in dealing with Lack of Support from the Audience. But in case, the campaign fails then the project will still be delivered but without Cut-Scenes and Graphics Enhancements.Who are We and Why we are Creating this?
We are two people. I do the development and my friend does the Marketing.
6 Months ago I left my Job to create some Great Games that I always dreamed of.

2 Months ago I got a wild idea about creating a Puzzle Hunt Game where the player would need to use Google to do the research and get the clues. Then, I developed a prototype in 2 days then gave it to 4 Friends. They all got excited and thus I got the motivation to create this game.
Last month I created, deleted, iterated various models and then I ended up creating something like right now. 


There is Always more than One Way to Contribute
The game itself is based on using whatever resources you have to solve the Puzzle Hunt.
So, we just need support. Any kind of Support. You can still help us by:-
- Sharing this Campaign with your friends ;)
- Greenlight the Game in Steam - Subscribe to our Facebook and Twitter Page
- Even dropping a Comment/Review is valuable for us ;)


To hear more about the Game, visit the Official Website or drop a mail on hybriona@gmail.com

story:

My name is Vladislav Castillo.
I`m freelancer from Ukraine.
I have the experience and skills to make the game, but I need some money.


Аbout game: This is a cruel, bloody and psychedelic game (slasher\horror) about Tomato Malo.


Platform:  PC

Languages: Ukrainian, English, Spanish, Japanese

Gameplay: more than 5 hours

Development time: less than a year.

story:
What is this... Garsylum ???

Hi Everybody! This is Justin Touchstone. I am the developer of the 2D video game  'Garsylum'!


Here is the DEMO if you would like to try it for yourself:

DEMO UPDATE COMING SOON!

http://ncomplex.com/justin/garsylum.html


The story revolves around Mason, a young gargoyle.

 After the passing away of the last Elder Gargoyle, Mason is alone and faced with an evil spirit that casts him out of Garsylum Tower. The land becomes cursed and twisted.

As the last gargoyle, Mason must find his own potential, journey back to the tower, and defeat the evil spirit.

  • Use your Block Powers to defeat enemies and find new areas.
  • Meet the interesting and unique creatures and folk of Garsylum.
  • Race between Gargoyle Statues to temporarily hold back the curse.
  • Help a witch open up her shop.
  • Find out the secret behind Gargoyles.
  • Find unique items to change the story.
  • And many more antics and adventures...

(Endings will vary depending on gameplay...)

This project has been in development for a little over a year now. I've been putting as much effort as possible into making a unique video game experience that revives the love of story telling in a 2D platformer. This has been a huge dream of mine since I was very young, but this is also about bringing game developers and gamers alike together in my local town, Gulfport, MS.


Trials & Treasures

I am looking for a minimum of $2000 which is just enough to cover 3 months of survival so that the game can be priority number one.

  • Funding received will go towards bills. To make this game a reality, electricity and internet is required if it is to be completed on time.
  • An arrangement of perks are available for you to choose from: STONE, RUBY, EMERALD, a LIMITED number of SAPPHIRE, and a single ONE-OF-A-KIND GOLD PERK! Each tier includes a copy of the game but the higher the perk, the better the content you will receive.
  • Even if the goal is not reached, any funding received will still be used to cover any portion of bills that would allow work on the game to continue.


Revealing Potential

This project is about more than just me releasing a game, it's also about bringing a game development scene to the Mississippi Gulf Coast. This area is a wasteland when it comes to came design and development and I would like to change that.

  • I want gamers and developers in my hometown to know that they can share their own creativity with the world by creating and contributing to games developed within their home community.
  • There is a lot of potential on the Mississippi Gulf Coast and I would like gamers, developers, and artists to see that potential and make it come to life.


I Don't Break Promises

 I promised myself a year ago that I wouldn't stop making games, ever, and I have not and will not break that promise. This game will be completed even if it takes more time than I would like.

If funding is unsuccessful or if funds run out before the game can be completed, I will have to find a secondary source of income, or in other words, find another job, greatly slowing down development and production of Garsylum.

  • Overcoming lack of funding will be difficult but not impossible. I am determined to complete this game and make it a reality.
  • Regardless of funding goals being met or not, all rewards will still be given to those who contributed and made the release of the game possible,

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everyone has the ability to help with funding. You can still help drive traffic to the site and spread the word for me. Share this with your friends, family, co-workers, everyone! Any publicity helps and is greatly appreciated!

  • You can find Garsylum on Facebook at: www.facebook.com/garsylum
  • IndieGoGo has share tools as well so please use them!
  • Send any feedback, questions, or requests to: FeedBack: garsylum@gmail.com  Developer: Justin Touchstone: jktouchstone@gmail.com or Marketing: Jyn Touchstone: jyntouchstone@gmail.com

Thank you in advance for any and all contributions, monetary or sharing! I really appreciate everything!

story:
Short Summary

Are you ready for an ultimate downhill race? Here is our next Mad Racing Game!

Experience the extreme speed and thrill with us!

What We Need & What You Get

We need about USD20,000 to develop this mobile game. We have raised about USD15,000 until now, and we need USD5,000 more. 

When our game is ready, we will send you the link for downloading this game and you can tell your friends that you made this game happen!  

The Impact

We have raised USD15,000, we just need USD5,000 more and we can have another great fun game! Help make the world a better and happier place by having more fun games, and not Terrorists!

If You Can't Help

If you cannot contribute the money, you can help us to share this to your friends, let them know there is a great fun game coming in the future!

story:
You will take the role of a caretaker named Haiden, in taking care of your sister and 2 of her friends. You will be staying in a vacation house during summer break. Out of boredom, your sister decided to ask you to join for a game of hide and seek, along with her friends. 

All in all, it’s just a fun day to pass time. What could have gone wrong?




Hi, I am Derek, the Lead Developer for this project.

Shoujo Seeker is a game of hide and seek with your sister and friends. Scores 3 stars by successfully finding 3 of them! The game feature unique point and click style gameplay. There will be puzzle elements involved, however using your instinct to find them is sometime recommended =)

Shoujo Seeker was initially developed for Windows PC and slated for release on Q4 2016. 


Steam was Greenlighted and we are able to proceed to have Steam version release.

 http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=676278478


Game Features:

★ Cute Cheerful Chibi Characters

★ High replay value with numerous scenes & scenarios

★ Multiple endings

★ Not everything is as it seems.


Screenshots:


Character Illustrations:




We are underfunded. In order to complete the game development, we are required to pay for resources. The team is made up of 2 full timers and 2 freelancers. Our indie team are small but we strive to be recognizable.

We set a realistic yet achievable goal at 6,000 USD to be the minimum in order to have the full game completed. The money received from backers will be 100% put into game development which are illustrated below: 



We will post constant updates on our progress and report how the money was spent in the campaign timeline. Every single $ really does count.


Other Ways You Can Help


You may also do us a huge favour by SHARING this page on your Facebook or Twitter feed. 

Alternative, you may vote for us in Steam Greenlight 

 http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=676278478




Time & Money. Game development schedules are hard to forecast. Any unexpected challenge could lead to changes and delay. Our team are gifted with creative mind therefore we wish to cramp all ideas into the finished product while ensuring quality are met.

Our team’s passion is to launch a product to the market that we can be proud of it. We wish to deliver the project on schedule using the funds provided by backers. Please join us in this journey, your support plays a huge role in defining our end product.



$ 8,000 - Secret Character. Additional female character will be added to final game with own unique personality, expression and poses.

$ 12,000 - Physical Copy. Physical copy will be produced along with original Game Box Artwork. All new and existing backers that opt for digital copy will receive a physical copy as well.

$ 16,000 - ???

$ 20,000 - ???

story:
Hello Lunar Fans!

My name is Sean David and I have been a Lunar Fan for over 20 years now. Just like you I waited for a true sequel of the real Lunar Games. So many years have past, and I decided to do what ever I can to help that we finally get a new Lunar game. In the last 4 weeks I got pretty far. I got the confirmation of many original staff members that they would love to return. We gathered more than 2000 votes of Lunar Fans who would love to see a third game. My goal is to gather 10000 votes to show "Game Arts" that there is still a great fan base and that we all want Lunar 3. But in order for us to finally contact Game Arts we need to mobilise more Fans. And this is not as easy. The most efficient way so far was to run ads on all social media platforms. But this coasts a lot of money. I have spent a lot of money out of my own pocket, and of course my resources are also limited. So I am hoping you guys can support me in order to run more ads, and to mobilise more fans!

My name is Sean David and I have been a Lunar Fan for over 20 years now. Just like you I waited for a true sequel of the real Lunar Games. So many years have past, and I decided to do what ever I can to help that we finally get a new Lunar game. In the last 4 weeks I got pretty far. I got the confirmation of many original staff members that they would love to return. We gathered more than 2000 votes of Lunar Fans who would love to see a third game. My goal is to gather 10000 votes to show "Game Arts" that there is still a great fan base and that we all want Lunar 3. But in order for us to finally contact Game Arts we need to mobilise more Fans. And this is not as easy. The most efficient way so far was to run ads on all social media platforms. But this coasts a lot of money. I have spent a lot of money out of my own pocket, and of course my resources are also limited. So I am hoping you guys can support me in order to run more ads, and to mobilise more fans!

story:
My Little Village is a strategic city building game made by a finn couple. As a player you get to control your own little village where you can follow the life of each villager in detail and up close. You get to decide the tasks of your villagers so that your village stays in a great balance. By playing My Little Village you can experience the rush of the leader. You need to succeed in making the right choices for your village so you can survive various disasters. You get to see how your little villagers develop and how their lineages grow. Your villagers will soon see if you are a good leader in the history books or are you one of them who could not reach a nicely balanced village. Come along and see how good of a leader you are for your little village!

 

 


    
    We will update on these social media platforms our game's development journey. On our website's DevBlog section we will update the development blog. Both of our developers will publish their own work there so you can view graphic designer's new art and developer's new game mechanics. Discord will be our main way to communicate with you. We are more than happy to discuss fun things about My Little Village and answer all your questions. Come to the Discord and chat with the game developers! We have published a Steam page about our game so be sure to wishlist My Little Village on Steam!

 

 

 

 

 

My Little Village gives you an opportunity to lead your little village. The biggest strategic challenge is to balance your villager's professions so that your village stays productive both in peace and in war. It is good for every villager to know many skills. This way you can maintain a healthy and functioning village. Your villagers are happiest doing the tasks they are the best at but remember if your villager's task changes multiple times, your villager's happiness will decrease. When war breaks out, your villagers don't know how to fight without military training from a good leader. But in times of peace, your villagers will not be able to gather enough resources if you focus only just that the war might be coming. From the family tree  you can view at the lineage of each villager. From there you can see the parents of every villager and their basic information such as name, age and cause of death. By looking at the lineage and skill tree you can give each and every villager a task where they are the best at. Cherish each of your families well and gather a lot of resources to make your little village grow and develop!

 

 

 

    The idea of combat in My Little Village is to defend your village from threats but also be a threat to others. Initially, soldiers work as individuals but when you build barracks you can optionally create battalions. Battalions are more resource consuming but are the all the more destructive. You need a very good soldier to lead every battalion. The leader of each battalion can train your other warriors even better. You can create multiple battalions as long as you remember to maintain a balance in your little village between war and peace. You can control battalions and individual soldiers to attack the threats from any direction. At this point you should start to use your tactics to defeat your enemy. Every fallen soldier in the battlefield will never come back. So be sure to train them as victorious as you can!

 

 

 

    A good leader knows the strenghts and weaknesses of their villagers. Doing each task increases a certain skill level and the better the level the better the villager is in this profession. Your villagers will be able to produce more resources and work longer at a higher skill level. You should make sure that each of your little villagers know many skills so in times of need, the villager is able to adapt to other professions as well. However, your villager may be dissatisfied if their occupation varies too frequently. The happiest the villager will be doing the task they are the best at. The skills of the villagers parents give an indication of where your little villager is good. A farmer's child is a good farmer but you get to decide what is the best profession of each of your villager.

 

 

When your villagers work, your village will remain active and successful. A good leader knows how to balance the professions of their little village so everyone has food and a roof over their heads. You are in charge of your own village where each villager is important. You can follow every villager in their profession and change tasks is the situation requires it. Remember that changing professions makes the villagers nervous and they are not so good at their new job. Every task is significant in your village. Be sure to balance the occupation of each villager so that you can grow your little village!

 

 

You can look at the family tree of each villager there you can see their lineage. From the family tree you are able to look at the parents and grandparents of each villager. You can view at every villager's name, age, profession and cause of death. Your villager's skills are based on the skills of their parents. If a child is born into a good military family they are probably a good soldier. But this doesn't determine the profession of your villager. You get to decide all tasks of your little villagers and you can use the family tree as a guide to what every villager could be by profession.

 

 

Every villager needs a home to rest after a hard day's work. If the villager cannot find a home they will leave to the woods in search of a better place to live. So remember to build enough houses that each of your villagers has a safe place. Each building has its own meaning in your little village for example a library will bring happiness to your village and storage allows you to store all your extra resources. Each building can be upgraded up to 10 levels. Every level brings new features to the building. As you upgrade your house you will be able to populate more villagers in one house. This saves you space and resources because you don't have to build a whole new house for each of your little villagers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

    My little village is created by a finn couple: one graphic designer and one programmer. We are both self-taught when it comes to making games but we have a lot of experience with the softwares which we use in My Little Village's development. We have always been interested in games. One evening we laughed at the idea of making our very own game. We woke up the next morning and realized that maybe we could do it. And that's how My Little Village got its start. 

    A graphic designer has always been interested in art. Since childhood she has been astistic with finger paints and with all that she got her hands on. She is at her best when creating 2D images. She has learned to use our main 3D software Blender herself in three years. A graphic designer is not just a graphic designer she is a multi-talent. She is of course our game's 2D and 3D designer also animator and music and sound creator. And on top of all that she will be more than happy to chat with you and answer your questions on Discord.

    Our programmer has learned the secrets of game development himself. While playing thousand and thousands of different games he has dreamed of making his own game. And now it is true. He also has experience in software engineering before the idea of My Little Village was even born. He has always been interested in creating things and seeing how they work. The programmer encodes all the functions of the game. He also implements all graphic designers artwork in the game. Our programmer is so motivated to program that he spends his free time coding in other projects. The programmer is a determined genius who keeps the pack together while a graphic designer waves a paint brush.
 

 

 

 

 

My Little Village has been produced by two people, one graphic designer and one programmer. Most of our budget goes to their salaries. The purpose is to bring security to next year so that the development of My Little Village remains as it is right now.

    My Little Village's core mechanics are ready soon expect for minor bug fixes. We plan to release our game on Steam in the summer of 2021. In January we will release information on how the game development continues and what we will then focus on. Be sure to join our Discord so you will hear about our plans for next year's game development!

 

Our biggest challenge is whether we get My Little Village advertised well enough. That's why we went to apply for funding at Indiegogo so as many people as possible would notice our game. We are confident that My Little Village will be well received. We hope that anyone interested in city building strategy games will find our game and anyone who is excited to test our game My Little Village and give feedback on our work.

Come along and see how good of a leader you are for your little village!          We will update on these social media platforms our game's development journey. On our website's DevBlog section we will update the development blog. Both of our developers will publish their own work there so you can view graphic designer's new art and developer's new game mechanics. Discord will be our main way to communicate with you. We are more than happy to discuss fun things about My Little Village and answer all your questions. Come to the Discord and chat with the game developers! We have published a Steam page about our game so be sure to wishlist My Little Village on Steam!     My Little Village gives you an opportunity to lead your little village. The biggest strategic challenge is to balance your villager's professions so that your village stays productive both in peace and in war. It is good for every villager to know many skills. This way you can maintain a healthy and functioning village. Your villagers are happiest doing the tasks they are the best at but remember if your villager's task changes multiple times, your villager's happiness will decrease. When war breaks out, your villagers don't know how to fight without military training from a good leader. But in times of peace, your villagers will not be able to gather enough resources if you focus only just that the war might be coming. From the family tree  you can view at the lineage of each villager. From there you can see the parents of every villager and their basic information such as name, age and cause of death. By looking at the lineage and skill tree you can give each and every villager a task where they are the best at. Cherish each of your families well and gather a lot of resources to make your little village grow and develop!       The idea of combat in My Little Village is to defend your village from threats but also be a threat to others. Initially, soldiers work as individuals but when you build barracks you can optionally create battalions. Battalions are more resource consuming but are the all the more destructive. You need a very good soldier to lead every battalion. The leader of each battalion can train your other warriors even better. You can create multiple battalions as long as you remember to maintain a balance in your little village between war and peace. You can control battalions and individual soldiers to attack the threats from any direction. At this point you should start to use your tactics to defeat your enemy. Every fallen soldier in the battlefield will never come back. So be sure to train them as victorious as you can!       A good leader knows the strenghts and weaknesses of their villagers. Doing each task increases a certain skill level and the better the level the better the villager is in this profession. Your villagers will be able to produce more resources and work longer at a higher skill level. You should make sure that each of your little villagers know many skills so in times of need, the villager is able to adapt to other professions as well. However, your villager may be dissatisfied if their occupation varies too frequently. The happiest the villager will be doing the task they are the best at. The skills of the villagers parents give an indication of where your little villager is good. A farmer's child is a good farmer but you get to decide what is the best profession of each of your villager.  When your villagers work, your village will remain active and successful. A good leader knows how to balance the professions of their little village so everyone has food and a roof over their heads. You are in charge of your own village where each villager is important. You can follow every villager in their profession and change tasks is the situation requires it. Remember that changing professions makes the villagers nervous and they are not so good at their new job. Every task is significant in your village. Be sure to balance the occupation of each villager so that you can grow your little village!  You can look at the family tree of each villager there you can see their lineage. From the family tree you are able to look at the parents and grandparents of each villager. You can view at every villager's name, age, profession and cause of death. Your villager's skills are based on the skills of their parents. If a child is born into a good military family they are probably a good soldier. But this doesn't determine the profession of your villager. You get to decide all tasks of your little villagers and you can use the family tree as a guide to what every villager could be by profession.  Every villager needs a home to rest after a hard day's work. If the villager cannot find a home they will leave to the woods in search of a better place to live. So remember to build enough houses that each of your villagers has a safe place. Each building has its own meaning in your little village for example a library will bring happiness to your village and storage allows you to store all your extra resources. Each building can be upgraded up to 10 levels. Every level brings new features to the building. As you upgrade your house you will be able to populate more villagers in one house. This saves you space and resources because you don't have to build a whole new house for each of your little villagers.          My little village is created by a finn couple: one graphic designer and one programmer. We are both self-taught when it comes to making games but we have a lot of experience with the softwares which we use in My Little Village's development. We have always been interested in games. One evening we laughed at the idea of making our very own game. We woke up the next morning and realized that maybe we could do it. And that's how My Little Village got its start.     A graphic designer has always been interested in art. Since childhood she has been astistic with finger paints and with all that she got her hands on. She is at her best when creating 2D images. She has learned to use our main 3D software Blender herself in three years. A graphic designer is not just a graphic designer she is a multi-talent. She is of course our game's 2D and 3D designer also animator and music and sound creator. And on top of all that she will be more than happy to chat with you and answer your questions on Discord.    Our programmer has learned the secrets of game development himself. While playing thousand and thousands of different games he has dreamed of making his own game. And now it is true. He also has experience in software engineering before the idea of My Little Village was even born. He has always been interested in creating things and seeing how they work. The programmer encodes all the functions of the game. He also implements all graphic designers artwork in the game. Our programmer is so motivated to program that he spends his free time coding in other projects. The programmer is a determined genius who keeps the pack together while a graphic designer waves a paint brush.     My Little Village has been produced by two people, one graphic designer and one programmer. Most of our budget goes to their salaries. The purpose is to bring security to next year so that the development of My Little Village remains as it is right now.    My Little Village's core mechanics are ready soon expect for minor bug fixes. We plan to release our game on Steam in the summer of 2021. In January we will release information on how the game development continues and what we will then focus on. Be sure to join our Discord so you will hear about our plans for next year's game development! Our biggest challenge is whether we get My Little Village advertised well enough. That's why we went to apply for funding at Indiegogo so as many people as possible would notice our game. We are confident that My Little Village will be well received. We hope that anyone interested in city building strategy games will find our game and anyone who is excited to test our game My Little Village and give feedback on our work.

story:
Maybe it's the nostalgia or the pixel-art design, but retrogaming makes everyone feel something unique and personal. What if you could play all your favorite retro games on a real handheld console, anywhere, anytime?

 

Meet the FunKey S, the world's smallest foldable handheld console.

 

The FunKey S is tiny enough to fit on your keychain, while powerful and comfortable enough to let you play thousands of retro games. You won't need to think about bringing another device with you in the morning, it's already there with you! 

 

 

It is now ready for production and only a few weeks away from bringing you a unique and awesome way to play your favorite retro games. 

You don't have to take our word for it, early reviews speak for themselves:

 

 

We need you now to make the FunKey S a reality, help us with the very last step of this journey and be among the very first to experience retrogaming in style anywhere, anytime!

 

 

 

The FunKey S is currently available in three different stunning colors :

Atomic Purple, Retrogaming Gray and Original Purple.

 

 

The most incredible aspect about the FunKey S is its size: we've designed it to be the perfect invisible companion for your everyday life. Thanks to it compactness, you can now have a powerful handheld console always attached to your keychain.

 

 

You'll never forget to bring it with you and won't even notice it's there, but when nostalgia calls and makes you remember an unbeaten boss, or an unfinished level, just pop it open and be ready to kick some ass!

 

 

Bored in transports, sleeping in class or simply having a few minutes to kill? Give yourself a well-deserved retrogaming break!

 

 

Everybody remembers how old clamshell mobile phones and consoles used to snap closed or pop open. The FunKey S is based on the same concept of active spring-powered hinge.

 

This foldable design brings two important features: 

  • Closed, the console naturally turns into a sturdy protective shell, no better way to protect the screen.
  • Opened, the console doubles its size to offer the largest possible screen and controls.

 

 

Also, we've added a sensor for detecting when the console closes or opens so that it will automatically save your game and power off or turn on the console and start back your game! We call this instant play and you won't believe how it makes everything easier, but read on for the full explanation later. 

 

 

Don't be fooled by its size, the FunKey S is powerful!

 

 

Be ready to discover - or rediscover - all your favorite classics. Already a dozen of retro consoles is playable on the FunKey S right now and the list won't stop growing: NES, SNES, Gameboy, Gameboy Color, Gameboy advance, Sega Master System, Sega Genesis (Megadrive), Sega Game Gear, Playstation 1, Atary Lynx, WonderSwan, Neo Geo Pocket.

 

 

 

Small is cute but - thanks to its foldable design - small also means comfortable once the console is opened.

 

 

 

 

We've made the most out of the FunKey S' foldable design: not only is it able to detect when it opens or closes, but the gaming experience is completely optimized for it.

Close the console and it will automatically save your game before turning itself off.

 

 

Open it and your game will start back in less than 5 seconds right where you left it!

 

 

We've also added this feature when the battery is too low or when you turn off the console manually, so whether it’s because you had to grab your coffee or ran out of juice, don’t be afraid to lose your adventure because we guarantee that you won’t!

You won't believe how instant play makes everything easier and for those of you who regularly play with current gen retro consoles, you'll have a hard time going back to not using this feature, believe us!

 

 

 

On the FunKey S what matters above all is providing the best possible gaming experience.

A whole new distribution called FunKey-OS has been built from scratch for an optimized, unified and clean experience so that you can focus on gaming and not get frustrated with the rest. Forget about multiple settings menus with different options and button mappings depending on one emulator or another. Forget about bloatware!

Just. The. Essential.

 

 

  • Boot under 5 seconds and start back your games right where you left them.
  • Enjoy a simple and consistent settings menu throughout the whole system.
  • Pressing the Fn button triggers the same quick shortcuts from anywhere.
  • System-wide notifications make everything clear for gamers and easy for developers.
  • Connect your console and add new games as simply as you would do it with a simple USB memory stick.
  • Easily access your saved files alongside your games to share or back them up.
  •  Upgrade the system without headaches by simply copying/pasting one file and rebooting.
  • Create/share new and amazing themes for the launcher with a simple text editor.
  • No unnecessary softwares out of the box (text editors, mp3 players...), but the software being open source, developers can easily add their own.

 

 

Everything is easy and fast so that you just need to focus on gaming.

 

 

  •  Dimensions: 42.5 x 44.5 x 13.8 mm (1.67x1.75x0.54 inches)
  •  Processor: ARM Cortex-A7 @ 1.2 GHz
  •  RAM: 64 MB DDR2
  •  Storage: SD card up to 128GB
  •  Display: LCD IPS screen, 1.54”, 240x240
  •  Audio: ∅10 mm mono speaker, 500 mW
  •  Battery: 400 mAh Li-ion battery
  •  LED charging indicator
  •  Micro USB Port: charge battery, load games

 

 

Since its origins, the FunKey S has proudly been Open Hardware & Open Source.

 

 

 

Many designs and tutorials are already online on Hackaday and we commit to keep every aspect of the FunKey S open. 

 

 

This means providing tutorials and putting in public repositories on Github:

  • All electronic design & production files
  • The whole FunKey-OS distribution
  • All launcher & emulator source files
  • All 3D-printable STL files for the casing

 

Basically, you have the keys!

 

 

 

The FunKey S is the fruit of years of passionate work. If you're curious here is a glance at the whole story: at the beginning was Keymu, an original concept of a cute, foldable handheld console, tiny enough to fit on anyone’s keychain, but powerful and comfortable enough to let you play thousands of retro games.

Keymu was only a prototype developed in a garage over 3 years ago, but it received an unexpected and overwhelming attention.

 

Keymu's unscripted video got millions of views on Youtube, tech medias picked up the buzz and dozens of articles were written, encouraging us to produce it…

Your enthusiasm captured our attention and made us want to work for this unique console to actually see the light of day outside of our garage.

 

 

We love reading your excitement and thoughts regarding our work. Want to discuss FunKey? Come over on our social medias, our website, or drop us a line here on Indiegogo, we'll promise to pay attention to your questions or remarks and respond asap!

 

It is thanks to your support and comments that the FunKey S is so close to become a reality and we could not be more grateful!

The end of the road is very near now and we need you more than ever!

 

 

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform where people support creative makers and entrepreneurs by pre-ordering unique products for later shipment.

The InDemand program is the opportunity for successful campaigns to keep in touch with their community and let the chance to new people to have their hands on the product.

How to order :

  1. Discover our project
  2. Select the perk of your choice
  3. Click "Get this perk"
  4. Log in to your account or continue as a guest
  5. Add your shipping and payment information
  6. You’re now a real pledger!

 

As stated in the introduction, we are ready for production. This means we have contacted multiple electro-mechanical manufacturers, got several quotes, evaluated their reliability and pinpointed the ones we'll partner with during production. Most of them are very excited about this project as well.

This also means, we have designed and prepared every detail up until the design of the packaging, the leaflet, the accessories in the box, the shipping company...

Basically, you'll get what you pledged for. No worries about this issue.

 

 

 

 

We could not have achieved this project without the help and support of very amazing people. 

First and foremost, the biggest shoutout is to our family and friends, putting up with the good and hard times, without whom we would not have made it this far.

Thanks Fabien for your amazing artistic vision, and Damien for painting our prototypes with such accuracy, you're a real airbrush worker. 

Big up to our young actors Samuel and Ethan, who displayed real talent for acting while playing video games, or maybe it's the other way around! 

Thanks to Valeria, Adeline and Luc for delivering Italian, Spanish and German subtitles in such a short notice ! Your contribution makes our work even more international.

Thumbs up to Todd Haskell, the voice of the video, and the GG Riggs band for the amazing music behind it!

Thanks to all the different media, influencers, Youtubers who talked about us and shared our project. In particular, thank you RetroDodo for being among the very first to reach us on Twitter and test our prototype objectively.

And last but not least, to the amazing community of retrogamers behind this project: THANK YOU. You welcomed the FunKey S in such a fantastic way, through your subscriptions, shares, likes, comments, feedbacks... We might have brought the project, but you made it shine. Thanks for that.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Production challenge:

In order to make this gaming console so affordable we must reach our fundraising goal because:

  • The casing and all related plastic parts require injection molding with an above-average quality, because of the small size and details. Such injection molds are really more expensive. The only way to reduce the cost per unit is thus to increase the quantities
  • We have to order more than 1000 assembled PCBs if we want to obtain a reasonable price
  • Moreover, most of the electronic components on the PCB have minimum order quantities of 1000-5000 piece full reels

 

This is why we must reach at least 1000 orders in order to make this incredible price possible!

Hardware development is done, everything is ready: 3Dmodels are done, PCB design is done, and manufacturers are ready to get started.

The only thing that is missing is a 1000 pieces order! What the FunKey Project needs now is you guys!

Back us now and help us reach our fundraising goal so that it will become reality!

 

Software challenge:

No risks there, all software developments are done internally, we (and you!) have total control on what is done since:

  • It is Open Source Software!
  • We have the technical expertise to deal with it, from the low-level bootloader intrisics up to the high-level graphics and application layers, with years of experience in embedded development
  • We expect the software to get a lot of momentum in the future, as plan to share all our mods as Open Source as well and provide an SDK (Software Development Kit) for external developers

 

We developed ourselves from scratch a dedicated embedded Linux operating system called “FunKey-OS”, based on the “buildroot” tool, rather than using a popular Linux distro out of the box. This choice was made in order to optimize speed and performance in order to maximum the hardware resources available.

We used numerous other Open Source packages as well, all forked and built from the sources, with an emphasis on respecting the original licenses and sharing our mods upstream whenever applicable.

We did many improvements:

- “fbtft”Linux kernel display driver optimizations:

  • Hardware DMA + Async kernel threads for SPI in order to reach the maximum theoritical refresh rate on these types of screen: 50hz.
  • Copy-less double-buffering: no CPU overhead.
  • Sync with screen display refresh in order to avoid tearing
  • Overlay layer for text notifications and battery status

- U-Boot bootloader an Linux kernel boot time optimizations

- Composite (Ethernet + Mass Storage) USB device driver configuration with cable insert detection

- Dedicated GPIO to key mapping service

- Pixel transparency in the SDL library

- RetroFE front-end enhancements:

  • Back-ported the to SDL 1.2 library to get rid of the OpenGL depency o Non-linear tweens
  • Fast scrolling
  • Dithering
  • Scrollable text in all directions
  • Image prescalling and cache
  • FunKey easy menu system

- Many retro gaming console emulator improvements:

  • Display speed optimizations
  • Fast bilinear display rescaling
  • Game backup/restore system for "Instant Play"
  • CPU and floating point vector optimizations o Quick Action Keys
  • FunKey consistent menu system

 

About the shipping:

Because of the COVID-19 pandemic situation, shipping costs have increased in a major way, however, we believe these prices should be back to normal as the health situation improves. In order to minimise costs for you, our backers, we will not be charging the current higher shipping charges at the time of pledging. The FunKey S will ship from Shenzhen in China with the best possible care. To avoid any delivery problems we will declare full value of the products. Shipping and taxes will be calculated and paid for towards the end of the campaign, just before we ship out to our backers.

We will be working hard to secure you the best shipping prices. Please provide a phone number for delivery, failure to do so might prevent successful delivery

 

Remarks:

 

- The FunKey S comes with our own pre-installed software with a number of retro gaming console emulators and some free (as in Freedom) games. We expect the number of emulators to grow in the future, as we plan to open the FunKey platform to external developers

This choice was made in order to optimize speed and performance in order to maximum the hardware resources available.We used numerous other Open Source packages as well, all forked and built from the sources, with an emphasis on respecting the original licenses and sharing our mods upstream whenever applicable.We did many improvements:- “fbtft”Linux kernel display driver optimizations:
Hardware DMA + Async kernel threads for SPI in order to reach the maximum theoritical refresh rate on these types of screen: 50hz.
Copy-less double-buffering: no CPU overhead.
Sync with screen display refresh in order to avoid tearing
Overlay layer for text notifications and battery status
- U-Boot bootloader an Linux kernel boot time optimizations- Composite (Ethernet + Mass Storage) USB device driver configuration with cable insert detection- Dedicated GPIO to key mapping service- Pixel transparency in the SDL library- RetroFE front-end enhancements:
Back-ported the to SDL 1.2 library to get rid of the OpenGL depency o Non-linear tweens
Fast scrolling
Dithering
Scrollable text in all directions
Image prescalling and cache
FunKey easy menu system
- Many retro gaming console emulator improvements:
Display speed optimizations
Fast bilinear display rescaling
Game backup/restore system for "Instant Play"
CPU and floating point vector optimizations o Quick Action Keys
FunKey consistent menu system
 About the shipping:Because of the COVID-19 pandemic situation, shipping costs have increased in a major way, however, we believe these prices should be back to normal as the health situation improves. In order to minimise costs for you, our backers, we will not be charging the current higher shipping charges at the time of pledging. The FunKey S will ship from Shenzhen in China with the best possible care. To avoid any delivery problems we will declare full value of the products. Shipping and taxes will be calculated and paid for towards the end of the campaign, just before we ship out to our backers.We will be working hard to secure you the best shipping prices. Please provide a phone number for delivery, failure to do so might prevent successful delivery Remarks: - The FunKey S comes with our own pre-installed software with a number of retro gaming console emulators and some free (as in Freedom) games. We expect the number of emulators to grow in the future, as we plan to open the FunKey platform to external developers

story:
INTO GAMING LOUNGE

CAMPAIGN MEMBERS

Hello, first of all I'd like to introduce myself. My name is Constantinos Kyprianou. I'm  a 19 years old retired soldier and I'm from Cyprus, I used to live in the UK for 1 year where I gained my first gaming experience on a computer. That is were everything started. I came back to Cyprus, I built my own computer tower and I started playing various games but mostly FPS Games. I took place in different tournaments both local and online, I got sponsored and then I started recording my gameplay, editing it and sharing it on YouTube. After sharing my editing work many teams offered me to join their team as an editor. I am currently working at a gaming lounge and soon I'm starting my tattoo courses. In the near future I will be probably streaming my gameplay, editing and sharing it more. Thank you!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/constantinos.kyprianou.96
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198028...
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/AzidoxESL/videos

Hello, my name is Achilleas Achilleos. I'm a 22 years old retired soldier and I'm from Cyprus. I am currently working as a Warehouse Assistant Manager and I am studying Business Administration at P.A College in Larnaca. Thank you!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/achilleas.achilleos.16...


GAMING LOUNGE DESCRIPTION


The name of our gaming lounge is 'Into', we thought of this name because our lounge will provide Customers/Members with the latest gaming equipment, software and hardware so they can get 'Into' gaming easier. Our goal is to create a Gaming Lounge that will also provide Gaming Development, Game Testing, Gaming Updates, Gaming Tournaments i.e. ESL, including facilities such as Gaming Software/Hardware Updates & Testing Section, Streaming/Editing Section, Work/Business Section, Arcade Section, Console Section and Cafeteria. 

- Gaming Development: Customers/Members can create their own game with gaming programming software such as:  
. Construct 2, Flixel, RPG Maker VX Ace, IG Maker, GG Maker, etc. (2D Genre).

. Unity, Unreal Engine (3D Genre).
 Each game will be stored in the game library, every 3 months the creator of the most highly rated game will be awarded with gaming software/hardware. 

- Game Testing: Computers will provide the latest released games (BETA trials included). Customers/Members can come and try out all new games and rate them. 

- Gaming Updates: Monitors in the gaming lounge will advertise the latest gaming software & hardware, will have a rating graphic scale for games that have been rated by Customers/Members. We will display global ratings and gaming broadcasts

- Gaming Tournaments: The Gaming Lounge will organise and host tournaments with awards for Gamers. Tournaments will take place live in the lounge or may be ESplayed (Electronic Sports). Customers/Members will be able to watch live tournaments hosted by the Gaming Lounge and by gaming giants such as ESL/LCS etc.


    



- Gaming Software/Hardware Updates & Testing: This section will provide monitors that will advertise the latest products. Customers/Members will have the opportunity to try out different software/hardware and will be able to access on-site repairs. Products will be available for purchase. 

- Streaming/Editing: This section will provide computers with editing software. Customers/Members will have the opportunity to live broadcast their gaming; they will also be able to edit and share their projects.

                         

- Work/Business: This section will provide computers with Microsoft software: Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Visual Basic, etc. Printers, Scanners, Projectors, Fax, etc will be available for use by Costumers/Members.

- Arcade Section: This section will provide Arcade Machines, Pool Tables, etc. 3 of the arcade machines will be for charity.

                
- Console Section: This section will provide Consoles (PS, XBOX, NINTENDO, etc).

- Cafeteria: In this section Customers/Members will be able to drink, eat and watch Live Matches (ESL/LCS, Sports, etc).


THE IMPORTANCE OF OUR GAMING LOUNGE

This business plan is important to us for a variety of reasons:

We want to provide gamers with a venue that is both exciting and exhilarating, whilst at the same time, is somewhere that they can go to relax and play games that they enjoy.

Our gaming lounge will allow people to experience gaming, improve their skills and abilities and provide them with opportunities to take part in competitions and tournaments.  We will encourage our Customers/Members to become professional at their gaming work. 

Furthermore we want to help them with anything they need, give them the opportunity to share their gaming with the world and share their ideas for a better gaming future.

Customers/Members will be able to create their own game/s and have people play the game/s and rate them. We want to help gamers create new stuff and put their ideas into action. 

The most important thing that matters to us is to make them feel like it’s their second home. They can meet other gamers, bring friends or come alone. There will always be a welcome for everyone. 

FUNDINGS/GOALS

 1st. Funding Goal: €300.000 (Rent Property)
2nd. Funding Goal: €760.000 (Buy Property)

- Land/Building:
€500.000

- Computer Towers, Monitors, Keyboards, Mice, Mouse Pads, Headsets:
1 = €1.500
70 = €105.000

- Gaming Chairs:
1 = €100
70 = €7.000 

- Cafeteria:
€30.000

- Carpenters Construction for Computer Set Placement:
€20.000

- Private Internet Line, Electrical/Technical Support (Internet, lights, etc):
€15.000

- TV Screens/Monitors:
1 = €500
20 = €10.000

- Arcade Machines, Consoles:
€10.000

- Softwares/Games:
€6.000

- Pool Tables:
€3.000

- Printers, Fax Machines, Scanners, Projectors:
 €2.000

- Extra Fundings*
€50.000

*Extra fundings are always a must for a business like this, the extra fundings are to start the campaign and already have a small budget for purposes such as Electrical/Technical Problems, the "Opening" Expenses, etc.
GAMING LOUNGE MEMBERSHIP/PAYMENT OFFERS

Memberships

The gaming lounge memberships are for helping out customers with better offers.

1 month membership: €10
3 hours in account, 1 T-Shirt and each time the member pays €5+ per day for 1 month the member will be given 1  hour for free. 

2 months membership: €20
5 hours in account, 1 T-Shirt and each time the member pays €5+ per day for 2 months the member will be given 1,5  hours for free. 

3 months membership: €30 
7 hours in account, 1 T-Shirt and each time the member pays €5+ per day for 3 months the member will be given 2 hours for free.

5 months membership: €50
10 hours in account, 1 T-Shirt and each time the member pays €5+ per day for 5 months the member will be given 3 hours for free.

Payment Offers

€1.50 = 1 Hour
€5.00 = 3 Hours + 1 Drink
€8.00 = 6 Hours + 1 Drink
€10.00 = 8 Hours + 1 Drink
€20.00 = 20 Hours + 1 Drink
€50.00 = 60 Hours + 2 Drinks


THE PERKS

€3000+ Contribution:  The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get 2 tickets to travel to Cyprus for 1 week. Stay at a 5 star hotel and have a game created from the Gaming Lounge. The game created by the Gaming Lounge will have the contributors name.

€2000 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get 1 ticket to travel to Cyprus for 1 week. Stay at a hotel near the beach and have a game created from the Gaming Lounge. The game created by the Gaming Lounge will have the contributors name.

€1500 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get 1 ticket to travel to Cyprus for 1 week and stay at a hotel near the beach.

€1000 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get a €500 gift card for Amazon.

€300 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get a gaming headset, a gaming mouse and a gaming mouse pad that we will send to him.

€100 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will take part in a giveaway for a Logitech Hardware (Mouse, Keyboard or a Headset).

€50 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get a 5 months gaming lounge membership, a mousepad and a T-Shirt created by the gaming lounge.

€30 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get a 3 months gaming lounge membership, a mousepad and a T-Shirt created by the gaming lounge.

€20 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get a 2 months gaming lounge membership, a mousepad and a T-Shirt created by the gaming lounge.

€10 Contribution: The contributor that will fund this amount of money will get a 1 month gaming lounge membership, a mousepad and a T-Shirt created by the gaming lounge.
THE RISKS OF THE CAMPAIGN/EXPENSES/FUNDING GOALS
. The expenses of our Gaming Lounge equipment reach €260.000 and the €500.000 are just for the Land/Building. If we reach €300.000 instead of buying property we will rent a place and open the Gaming Lounge.

. If we don't reach our funding goals we will probably relaunch this campaign 2-3 times and if we still don't reach our funding goals we are still opening the Lounge but with less sections for the meaning time and if we earn enough money we will complete the creation of the sections. 

Facebook page will be linked as soon as possible for the progress and updates of our campaign.

Note: We will refund the money if we do not reach our funding goal.


We just want to say that any kind of help is appreciated. We are aware that not everybody can contribute financially but please spread the word for our campaign and help us succeed. Thank you!

story:
I want to help you win your fantasy football league this season!

My name is Jim Kutsko and I have been playing fantasy football since the early 2000s.  I've learned a lot during that time and the most important thing is how important the fantasy draft is to the success of your team.  In my opinion, success in fantasy football is 50% the draft, 30% managing your team during the season and 20% good old-fashioned luck!  The draft was always my least favorite part of the fantasy season because it was both time consuming and frustrating to find the information I wanted to know about players in order to make determinations as to whether I should target or avoid that player come draft day.

I decided that I should create an app that allows fantasy football players to easily and quickly create a fully customized draftlist that is set to their league's settings and their personal player preferences!  The app has a super easy interface and requires only two steps for the user to complete.

1.  Set your league point schedule for offensive players.

2.  Filter unwanted players from your list based on certain statistical categories

The app then does all the heavy lifting.  From the league point schedule it will automatically calculate each player's projected points for the upcoming season and value each player accordingly.  Then the filter turns player research on it's head.  Instead of you having to look up stats for each player on the draftlist, you tell the list what your criteria is and it will eliminate all players that do not meet that criteria! 

How much is your time worth?  Don't you think that $5 is a small price to pay to save you hours of research time?  Please head over to my website: ffmaverick.com to see more

What we need

We are looking to raise $10,000 through sale of the app.  The money raised will help to cover some of our startup costs and allow us to expand out marketing and publicity of the app. All of these things will be possible, even if we don't reach our goal, but we want to get this app to as many fantasy gamers as possible - we hope you will join us in our quest.

When you make a donation of $5 or more you will have access to the app for your fantasy draft.  If you do not play Fantasy Football we still encourage you to make a donation and help us to continue to develop and grow My Perfect Fantasy Draft. If you send us $25 or more, we'll send you a My PFD Rookie Season T-Shirt!

If you are unable to make a donation to our app launch, we still need your help - please SHARE the link to this page on your social media outlets and help us SPREAD THE WORD about My Perfect Fantasy Draft. Many thanks for anything you can do to help us reach our goal and help this product go out to as many fantasy gamers as possible! 

Many thanks for your time and attention - have a great fantasy football season.

story:
We ask you only 1$, the price of a coffee !

Not only a single person but a group of people have tried to find true love via mobile sites and applications but have finally faced different failures. We have deduced that we can’t put the blame on us but on the operation of applications. This is why we are thinking about revolutionizing meetings. We delate everything and we start again. Thanks to Tiles we encourage people to speak and therefore to know each other without preconceptions or barriers related to people’s appearance. 


-How does it work?

The principle is simple, fun and exciting. The application puts two people in connection, they discover the photo of their correspondent and they are obliged to exchange messages. In fact, their photos are divided into 144 small squares, the two persons can discover a square when there's an exchange. It will be possible for the user to choose the sex, the age group and the maximum distance with the correspondent thanks to the geolocation.

The user can connect himself via his facebook account, or create his profile using his email address. 


- Key Features 


-For who ?

All holders of smartphones who want to meet people without age limits.


-About Application

The application will be free and available on Android (Google Play) and IOS (App Store). It will be intuitive and light. Regular updates will be made to keep an optimal experience for the user.


How will it be implemented ?

The project is already in a very advanced stage, the idea was filed, the contact with the developer has already been performed, the interface and the operating mode have been finalized, to reach the final project. Only money is missing and this why we appeal to your generosity. When the application is available and even before, a prospecting work will be done via social networks, radio ads, flyers etc …


What’s the purpose of financing ?

To estimate the cost of implementing, everything has been taken into account and we appealed to specialists of mobile application development, Yeeply. Thus, we have been able to advance the project. They made a quotation: 

This quotation enables us to say that the application costs about: 6500 € (7333$). The extra money will be used for the prospecting and to ensure the maintenance of the application and also the commission. The funds will be distributed like this:


-Gift



- Beyond the donations

As you understand, reaching the donation's goal is our priority and to do so we need YOUR help !

Some of you will not be able to help us like they want simply because their budget don't let them

be as generous as they want .We encourage those people to talk about our project to their

entourage this will mean alot to us and it's a huge help !


-Who are we ? 

Azzouz: Graduate marketing studies.

Djidel: Graduate studies in information and digital systems.

Hour: Graduate studies of technological innovation and eco design

story:
We are a group of independent developers that are looking to gain experience while creating games and working on projects that we've developed a passion for. This project truly is a dream come true as it based off one of our most beloved mods that has been around for over a decade. Among us you can find Sleggie (Project Leader) and Hoobalugalar; the lead programmer and creator of the very successful free-to-play game Codename CURE.

Zombie Escape is a free-to-play multiplayer game based off the popular Counter-Strike community-created gamemode, with an RPG twist. The core of the game involves escaping the zombie team as humans in a player-versus-player fashion. Zombie Escape is designed to be played with a large number of people - we're talking about 20-50 players altogether. This makes for a fun, social and fast-paced gameplay environment.  As a zombie, your goal is to infect the humans in order to stop them from reaching the end of the level.

We plan on integrating a leveling system into the game while ensuring that gameplay will be balanced for newcomers and experienced players alike.

Unlike many other zombie games, being a zombie is actually just as fun as being a human. Like in the Counter-Strike version, once a zombie injures a human, they are automatically infected and can continue infecting everyone around them as a zombie theirself. Humans can defend themselves from zombies by shooting them which both damages and knocks them back. If a zombie takes too much damage, they will die and respawn near a teammate. We really are aiming for a simple, arcade feeling.
 
 
Prototype health HUD on the left. This image is from Alpha 1.1, which is currently 2 patches behind.
 
So far in our development, we have managed to create an infection system, a round system and human class system. In addition to that, we have balanced the current weapons and have made a tested the game multiple times to ensure it looks and feels the way we expected it to at this point in our development.
 
 Q: Why not play the original Zombie Escape mod?
A: Zombie Escape offers a plethora of new weapons and items that the original mod could not support! Zombie Escape will feature regular client updates that will introduce an immense arsenal of weaponry to players. Zombie Escape will also feature an experience-based level-up system. The game is also free! In conclusion, the standalone version of Zombie Escape will open the gates to create a much more immersive and unique Zombie experience!
 
At the time that this fundraiser has been published, we've been working on an official map (Highway), our HUD/GUI, more awesome music, zombie classes, more models (which are coming very soon) and are looking into developing a weapon unlocking system. Those are our current priorities.
 
What we plan to do afterwards is improve what has been already created, improve the engine, add more weapons and take in all the feedback we've gotten to truly make this the project of our dreams. 
 
 
 
The game will be available on Steam (if Greenlit, of course) and will be running on the Source engine.
 

To some, this might be a turn off, but who cares? It's addictive! And trust me when I say this. If any of you Team Fortress 2 players remember how the game was back in 2007 and 2008, you were awarded for playing the game with a variety of uniqu item drops. That's exactly what we're planning on doing here, minus the obnoxious crate and key system similar games are using today. The only way you can get the special non-cosmetic items are by playing, which means that everyone is equal in their chances, and nobody has an advantage over anybody else. This also means that there is a point to both playing and winning! 
As of now, the inventory system is designed to be divided into six categories: primary weapon, secondary weapon, melee, grenade and ability.
As for the zombies, they are able to pick through different classes. These such classes are planned to be: leaper, runner and tank, with their own rank-up system based off of a player's experience points (XP), featuring a robust customization system behind that.

 

The game will be 100% free to play. This means no microtransactions or "premium" content.

 

In addition to the above, the game is based around general updates. We plan to continue to support the game after release, which will include new weapons, perks, abilities, maps and so on. This keeps users motivated and keeps the game even more fresh and unique. There really isn't an end! 

 

Don't you hate it when games don't allow you to create your own servers? Well that's definitely not the case here. We'll offer all the tools users will need and try our best to support community servers.  We also have our official forums where we can help modders, players and server owners. In addition to that, we have been showcasing our developments and directly talking to the community via our Twitch streams every week. We plan to keep doing so. In addition to that, if you would like to join the team or help us out even more, you can definitely contact us via Steam or the forums once again. 

 
 

This fundraiser will last 60 days. That's 60 days that we'll be updating this page in order to include more information as time goes on. If you don't entirely like what you see, but do fancy the idea, feel free to contact us and let us know what you think. The money will go towards licences, official servers, supporting the developers and quite a few other important expenses.

 

 

If you chose to donate, here's what we would love to offer for your support.
  • 5$: Thank you for supporting the project! You will get a special rank on the forums and access to exclusive posts, news, screenshots, events and more.
  • 10$: All of the above, plus instant access to the beta when it comes out.
  • 25$: All of the above, plus your name will be featured in the credits.
  • 100$: All of the above, plus an exclusive meeting and direct contact with the lead developers.
If we reach our goal of 5000$, we will include another gamemode on release: Survival (by popular demand). In this gamemode, you must beat the clock in a constrained environment surrounded by player-controlled zombies. You can either try to avoid them or build barricades to stay alive.
 
Thank you for reading and we hope to have caught your attention. Feel free to contribute to the project and contact us if you have any inquiries, suggestions or feedback on our developments.
