story:
ENTER SKY CLIMBERS

VISION

We at Fizik Studios are avid gamers. The one thing we've noticed is that modern MMOs are very restricting. You grind, turn in quests, and level up. It's dry, repetitive, and fails to incorporate the player's creativity.

This was the reason why we decided to embark on this project. Sky Climbers is an ambitious attempt to break the mold that our predecessors have set. Within reach is a player-driven game that supersedes all other MMOs in terms of freedom and creativity. Be anyone, build anything, and behold all that you have created.

WORLD

The Floating Islands of Stratus is where our story takes place. A boundless reach of drifting archipelagos where no power holds sway.

Stratus is a wild and lawless dimension; save for the few scattered remnants of civilization stationed on lone islands adrift in the cosmos. There is no real order other than what the islanders make for themselves. As such, each island is a unique province in and of itself, ruled over by bandit kingpins, Orc warlords, long-dead mummy pharaohs and other, more sinister beings.

PHYSICS

Everything you do in Sky Climbers is Newtonian physics-based, and everything is destructible.

This is made possible by a new compression algorithm that our mathematicians created specifically for this game, which allows tens of thousands of objects to be transmitted to and from the server using very little bandwidth.

Every piece of every object is updated through every client in real time!

GAMEPLAY

In Sky Climbers you can capture islands, harvest resources, kill enemies, and build anything you can imagine. You enter the world with a pair of wings and a bit of money. From there, it's up to you what comes next.

Join a faction, fight the forces of evil, or live out your days beside a riverside cabin that you built. The possibilities are endless.

VR

In order to make this game as immersive of an experience as possible, we are going to be implementing most of the current VR gear available. This will be incredibly easy because of the physical nature of the game. We will be supporting almost all VR headsets, and almost all controllers, including leap-motion. We will also be supporting VR treadmills and haptic feedback equipment. As more equipment becomes available it will be our goal to support every method of interfacing with this game in order to make it more accessible, and more immersive.

We have already had success implementing OSVR and leap-motion into Sky Climbers with ease. With more funding to purchase more equipment, we could implement everything stated above.

Besides, who doesn't want to fly around in virtual reality?

CRAFTING

You have the option to choose from hundreds of pieces to create anything you can imagine. There are motors, ropes, sails, pulleys, hinges, weights, wheels, and so much more to come in every update.

Build a trebuchet to defend your island, pilot a DIY airship, or erect an impenetrable megalithic murder castle.

WHY WE NEED YOU

Development is currently at a standstill. We are quickly running out of funds and need to hire developers and 3-D content creators if we ever hope to bring Sky Climbers to life. Below is a brief overview of costs over the two years this game will be in development.

Hiring developers and 3-D modelers isn't cheap. In order to reduce costs and release this game sooner rather than later, we will be purchasing many premade models, animations, and sounds; however there is still a considerable amount of original content that must be designed.

The extra $50,000 will be used for things such as purchasing VR equipment, paying for advertising, and any unforeseen expenses that may arise.

story:
Hello everyone!

In 2015, we released a Flash game called StrikeForce Kitty 2, which received good reviews and then got the Best Arcade 2015 award on the Armor Games website. When we switched to Steam, we were thinking about which game to release first, and we decided to remaster this good, fun game.

 

StrikeForce Kitty is a PC arcade platformer with RPG elements, where the player controls a team of four cats saving their kingdom from the fox army that is storming the capital of the Cat Kingdom.

 

The game's main feature is the suits that the player receives for victories over the foxes.  The suits make the characters stronger and give them abilities that open new ways of completing the levels. Each suit is a reference to pop culture: movies, games, comics, anime, cartoons.  In addition, you can pump the cats up by training them in the gym, making them stronger, faster and more resilient.

Each level is about finding the optimal path. With new abilities, you can discover new ways of completing the level and find rarer suits. Searching for these paths often becomes a puzzle of its own.

You can play and get an idea of the game here:

 

What exactly we decided to improve:
1) Graphical content. We're drawing new tiles for each biome to make the graphics more saturated and detailed.

 

2) The number of suits. We're planning to raise it from 225, in the original game, to 350..

3) New levels. We'll rework the 12 old levels, and more suits will make it possible to create additional levels for the game.

4) Team bonuses. We will add bonuses for getting together thematic teams from the characters' suits, starting with simple ones: for example, teams made up of the game's characters; and ending with teams that are related by plots in their own universes.

5) Improved battles. In addition to passive skills that give you bonuses or open new paths, now the suits will give you active skills for battles. This will make the battles more tactical, and will allow for increase of the importance of the suit in comparison with the outfits from elements of different suits that give higher capabilities.

6) Thematic bosses. By getting a specific team together, you will open a new location on the map with a boss connected by plot or meaning to your team. After defeating the boss, you will receive a new suit that will may open up something new.

7) More animation, effects and sounds for thematic suits.

8) A casino and a restaurant. The casino will allow you to win suit elements or just increase your experience level for pumping up the kittens. The restaurant will allow you to adjust the combat potential of your team with meals by strengthening or compensating for one of the characteristics of the cats on your team.

 

9) The game will support two languages: Russian and English.

 

The general concept of the game will be elaborated and smoothed out. Most of the content is ready. We plan to complete development this fall.

Right now the game needs your votes to pass Greenlight!

 

 

We are an independent studio consisting of three guys who work remotely from each other. Creating games is our hobby. It is our love, passion and favorite pastime.

 

Now that we are getting onto Steam, we want to make the game much more interesting and high-quality.

We're working hard, but we need help finishing the game. IndieGoGo is an excellent tool for indie developers without a budget or a publisher.

Your contribution will help us finish the game and make it really cool.

All funds received will be used for feed and milk for the kitten-developers.

story:
Hello I'm Nikola 27 years old Freelance Game Artist. I assembled indie team "Trotil Team" of young inspired people, to make our first game. My passion is :comics ( I'm a collector), games, medieval fantasy & western genre of the movies. 

WWW.DIEORSURVIVE.COM 

WWW.INDIEDB.COM

 

[The short version of the story]

Wanted | Die or survive is an open world, adventure, story based, survival, wild west game. Player will take the role of John M. Stevenson who is sent by congress in small town to resolve the dispute between town folks and native Indians. The plot begins when John realizes that the industrial tycoons are involved in the dispute. And he needs to find a fair solution.  Without shedding blood, and advocates for truth. He'll be set up to be killed in an accident. Being compelled to find out who is on his team, he will be attacked in the forest expedition. He will survive with the help of Indian Kangee (meaning "raven" on Sioux language). He will find his way through forests, mountains and deserts into the town to take revenge. On the way he will have to survive, he will meet Indians, trappers, hunters, bounty hunters (some will be friendly, some not), wild animals, bad weather conditions... Discover the Indian villages, settlements of miners, abandoned houses ...

 

 

We will use your funds for:

  • Exclusive software licenses
  • Additional game artists
  • Additional programmers
  • Additional gear for game development
  • Hiring voice actors
  • Renting adequate space

Every pledge will help us to develop this game faster. Contribute today and receive exclusive rewards available only to those pledging through this Indiegogo campaign.

​​

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute as a backer, you can help by spreading the word. Feel free to post any of our promotional art, videos and links anywhere on social media or forums or any place that might help spread the word!

​

story:
Are you ready to sell more?

KADU is the Payments Collection Technology that facilitates financial and commercial inclusion so that e-commerce stores can accept local CASH payments in Latin America without the need for setting up local companies, and so that they can accept global payments through virtual methods such as Neteller and Bitcoin, integrating in one single platform multiple payment methods.

KADU's team has over 15 years experience in e-commerce and more than 5 years in e-payments. This experience allowed us to create a powerful platform that will allow you to offer innovative payment methods.

The KADU group counts with companies in the United Kingdom, Costa Rica, Colombia, Mexico, Chile and Brazil, and partners around the world to support the most convenient payment methods.

The next 4 countries sum 400 million of population, it is about 67% of the Latin America market.

  
Brazil, currently we offer +100,000 physical points to collect your payments; planning to support +200,000 around Brazil thanks to your help.


  

Colombia, currently we offer +20,000 physical points to collect your payments; planning to support +40,000 around Colombia thanks to your help.


Mexico, currently we offer +20,000 physical points to collect your payments; planning to support +40,000 around Colombia thanks to your help.

Chile, planning to support +17,000 physical points to collect your payments around Chile thanks to your help.
More details in https://kaducollect.com/en/merchant/payment-methods/


Main Value Propositions




You can integrate KADU now

The MVP (minimum viable product) is done.  We appreciate your help to connect more and more payment methods. 

Download API documentation


How does KADU help you save money?

We have 3 pricing types:  Collections fees, Withdrawal fees, Membership.

Market Collection Fee is about 6%.  Current fee in KADU is 2,48% for most popular Cash payment methods.  

Please feel free to estimate how much money you will save in Memberships if you take the perks.


Our team, your team

We are 30 e-commerce passionate guys.  Developers, designers, lawyers, accountants, managers, finance and tax experts support KADU technology.


Thanks, God Bless You !
story_txt:
Are you ready to sell more?
 KADU is the Payments Collection Technology that facilitates financial and commercial inclusion  so that e-commerce stores can accept local CASH payments in Latin America without the need for setting up local companies, and so that they can accept global payments through virtual methods such as Neteller and Bitcoin, integrating in one single platform multiple payment methods.
KADU's team has over 15 years experience in e-commerce and more than 5 years in e-payments. This experience allowed us to create a powerful platform that will allow you to offer innovative payment methods.
The KADU group counts with companies in the United Kingdom, Costa Rica, Colombia, Mexico, Chile and Brazil, and partners around the world to support the most convenient payment methods.
The next 4 countries sum 400 million of population, it is about 67% of the Latin America market.




  

Brazil, currently we offer +100,000 physical points to collect your payments; planning to support +200,000 around Brazil thanks to your help.



  
Colombia, currently we offer +20,000 physical points to collect your payments; planning to support +40,000 around Colombia thanks to your help.








Mexico, currently we offer +20,000 physical points to collect your payments; planning to support +40,000 around Colombia thanks to your help.





Chile, planning to support +17,000 physical points to collect your payments around Chile thanks to your help.


More details in https://kaducollect.com/en/merchant/payment-methods/


  
Main Value Propositions
 







You can integrate KADU now
The MVP (minimum viable product) is done.  We appreciate your help to connect more and more payment methods. 

Download API documentation
How does KADU help you save money?
We have 3 pricing types:  Collections fees, Withdrawal fees, Membership.


Market Collection Fee is about 6%.  Current fee in KADU is 2,48% for most popular Cash payment methods.  
Please feel free to estimate how much money you will save in Memberships if you take the perks.
Our team, your team
We are 30 e-commerce passionate guys.  Developers, designers, lawyers, accountants, managers, finance and tax experts support KADU technology.

Thanks, God Bless You !

story:
Hello there! We are Studio Spektar, indie game developer from Croatia bent on world domination! Since world domination is pretty expensive we rather decided to make a game about the same topic. Also, we figured it would be fun to do it as a boar named Viktor in a game that beares the same title.

Viktor is a classic point and click adventure game set in a fictional world where not only do animals talk, but history has also taken a weird turn. As if the talking animals wasn't enough? The story focuses on our protagonist, or should we say antagonist, Viktor. We want to deliver a high quality funny game inspired by the great classics like Monkey Island.


But don’t take our word for it. Why not check out the game yourself?


Didn't feel like playing the game? Why not check out the intro to Viktor. Just so you can get a taste of this really bizarre world we are creating.

Looks fun, huh? We loved creating it!




Check out the smoke on that one!

Our artist, Sven, created all these beautiful drawings from his great artistic mind. We usually gave him some time to think it trough then pressure him like crazy to get them done to a certain deadline although there was no actual deadline. Artists are an interesting bunch.


Well this is a map I could hang in my living room next to the tiger rug and the fire place.

We at Studio Spektar believe in equality. Because of that, we believe that everybody should be offended equally. No matter if you are from Mei-Din, Ban-An-As or Austria-Hungary (like we are!).


Hey! Who put a picture of my bathtub here?!


Even though point and click adventure games are slow, there is no reason why your pointing and clicking shouldn't be fast at times. Test your reactions in some of our fun (and at times frustrating) mini games!


Hour and hours of recorded high quality dialogue

1. Dramatic monologue

2. Emotional monologue

3. Shakespearean sonata

Can you hear the pure pronunciation of each work? The crisp sound made in a professional studio? You can listen to those sounds for hours! Yes, we know. We are speechless as well.

Like anyone with a project, we need FUNDING! Our goal is to get at least 10.000$ in order to focus our efforts on finishing Viktor within a year. Every dollar will go into development of the game which includes: paying rent, buying food and generally surviving until we finish the game.

After that, WE TAKE OVER THE WORLD! *cough cough* I mean, we go and create new games for you to enjoy!


However, if the game will not reach it's funding goal then all the funds will go *drum roll* to the same place. We will invest more time to finish the game. Eventually, it will see the light of a computer screen at midnight. But if you want to support us, we can get it faster to YOUR computer screen!

Check out the phenomenal prizes you can win if you choose to support us!

Cog: Your name in the credits and our gratitude for helping us make this game a reality.

 

Bronze boar: DRM-free digital download of the game for Windows, Mac and any other versions we build, depending on the stretch goals.


 Purple Hat: 

All of the above. Digital copy of the soundtrack, a Viktor-themed set of wallpapers and ringtones.


Golden Cog: All of the above. Beta access! You get to try the early builds, mini-games, dialogues and many other things before anyone else and you can help us improve the game based on your feedback.


Silver Zebra: All of the above. Name or a slogan of your choice graffitied on a wall somewhere in the game and full HD in-game digital maps. Insult a loved one or confuse a friend. Suggestions must be PG-99 or nicer.


Holy Yak: All of the above.Physical DVD to keep you warm at night.


Iron Chipmunk: Only available in THIS limited tier: Your own brand of food or drink! Name a consumable commercial product in Viktor’s world after you, your dog or anyone else that isn’t an existing product brand. You provide ideas, we provide design and a place that can sell it to Viktor. Includes all previous reward tiers.


Metal Wings: One T-shirt of your choice in the size of your choice on top of all of the above rewards (excl. the limited tier). Printed maps from Viktor’s world! The DVD will be signed by the developers.


Everlasting Frog: Choose: A stuffed toy Viktor or a hand painted 3D statuette of Viktor! Plus, all of the above.


Huge Angry Raccoon: You will be a cameo character in the game with a cheesy line and a custom voice. Plus, all of the above.


Glowing Ladybug: Only in this limited tier: You will be an important character in the game. We discuss the details over the internets. Plus all of the above.

Hypnotic Lobster: All of the above and it all comes in a steampunkish Viktor-themed fancy wooden chest with your name engraved on it. Plus, you get to design a minigame that Viktor will pass on his way to become the Emperor!


Flying Elephant: You will get everything! All of the above (ALL OF IT! EVEN THE LIMITED TIERS!) plus you get to choose a location that Viktor will visit! Heaven, hell, your mom's basement... You name it!

Just look at that chest!


Why should this project succeed?

Many of you have seen classics from great studios, like Lucas Arts, that created awesome adventure games. Have you seen any Croatian adventure games? Why not contribute and see more just what kind of weird sense of humor we really have!

We've already got a Steam Greenlight community confirmation and have been featured in more than a couple of sites.



Well what do you know, we are everywhere!


The risks and challenges are minimal. If the game doesn't succeed on IGG, you will get your moneys worth eventually. When we finish the game, you will get ALL the rewards you pledged for. And we'll finish it. How do we know? Because, despite our other jobs that earn money, we're still working on Viktor, whenever we have the opportunity.

Our biggest challenge is actually getting the financial support to continue making the game. We just need money to eat. Some sleep would be nice too!

Basically, once we get some funding our lives will revolve around making this game happen. Sven will draw, Zvonimir will animate, Aleksandar will code and the other Sven will keep you informed on the state of the game, announcements and other stuff you might want to know.

Do you still want to help, but don't have the money to do it?
No worries! Share our campaign with you friends, family, acquaintances, enemies, barbers, doctors, firemen and even presidents! We will be forever greatful!

Help a boar out!

story:
( If you want to see the high resolution version of these screenshots, you can follow my facebook and download these screenshots:

https://www.facebook.com/jingrui.gu

If you don't have a facebook account, you can send me an email and ask for these screenshots. My email: musou0@hotmail.com. Due to the jet-lag, you will recieve my reply one or two days later.

And you can also see the pitch video at youtube:
http://youtu.be/PGbIsxIh2-w
Or at vimeo:
https://vimeo.com/135022290

If you have ANY questions or suggestions about this game, such as " could there be better rewards in this perk?" or "can I know something more about this game?" or "why you need so much" or ANYTHING ELSE, please post it into the comment or send me an email, I will be happy to reply or write a Q&A as soon as possable.

Please spread these screenshots and the pitch video to anywhere else and let more people know this game. Thank you! )


As a player, maybe you have experienced these things again and again in a great deal of games:

·It’s midnight, you playing late, and getting sleepy, really wants to go to bed, but still decide to grow one more level;

·You already know playing this game have no fun, even feeling so sick when playing, but you still decide to buy and play it, only because you can get more trophies or achievements;

·Just clicking one button, repeat one action for several hours, just because you think the next monster will drop a better weapon or armor for you, or you just need some materials but the drop rate is a lottery;

·You really hate some points of a game, tell the developers, and they just reply such as “love it, then stay; otherwise, get away”, you feel angry but still stay;

·After beating a game for days or weeks, then look back and thought, “why the HELL was I ruining my hundred hours of life on that?!”

If you have experienced one or some of these, then you have to know:

YOU ARE NOT PLAYING THE GAME. YOU, AND WE, ARE ACTUALLY BEING PLAYED BY THE GAME.

WHY WE PLAY GAMES AT FIRST? AND WHY WE PLAY GAMES FOR NOW?

DIDN’T WE PLAY GAMES FOR FUN?

WE SHOULD PUT AN END TO THIS!

THAT’S WHY I STARTED TO CREATE THIS GAME, A GAME OF THE PLAYERS, AND WE PLAY IT – FOR FUN.




UNLIMITED EXPLORE is a game including sandbox environment creation, totally-free exploration and completely modifiable contents with the ARPG combat and leveling system. There are some differences between Unlimited Explore and other games, but it’s not hard to understand.

FIRST, WE CREATE. Do you have a place you want to go? Do you have a world in your heart build by your great imagination? Or you just want to bring your house into the game? Build what you want in CREATION MODE. Just pick some components in the game, put them to the right places, and you will create Mountains, forests, castles, dungeons, or something else. If this game can get more support, and we can dive underwater, fly high in the sky, even space environments (and environments with no gravity) will be available. After that, place some monsters, bosses, and items, NPCs, Quests (if got enough funds to build the quest function), then everything’s done.



SECOND, WE VOTE. Vote is the biggest feature of this game. So why do we need to vote in this game? It’s simple, we vote for the best maps of the week, and those maps will be the next update – be the official maps. In other words – let all the players know, and play what you create.

You may ask, “How can I vote before I play someone’s map?” Good question.

We can download and play others’ maps in FREE EXPLORATION MODE. After you play the map, you can vote to decide this map is a good map or not. IF your maps get the best ratings, then congratulations – if not, don’t feel sad, anyone can still download and play your maps in free exploration mode. You can also try to update them, make them better and get another chance UNTIL success.



THIRD, WE PLAY. Those best maps of the week will be the contents in the next update, be the official maps – in EXPLORATION MODE. There’s only one goal when playing exploration mode– explore and open all teleport points. What about the rest? Slaying some monsters and bosses? Searching for some hidden rooms and easter eggs? It’s all up to you. You’re totally FREE in the game. And I hope I can have a chance to bring some more interesting things into the game.




GAME OF THE PLAYERS: Most of the games we buy only give us the right to use (play). But UNLIMITED EXPLORE is different: this game will give you the OWNERSHIP of the game, to create and change everything. There’s more – UNLIMITED EXPLORE is an OPEN SOURCE game, you can access all codes in order to create mods or game systems, that’s why I call this is a game of the players.



GAME BY THE PLAYERS: UNLIMITED EXPLORE is a game by the players, because we create contents for ourselves, and you can always create what you want to play. We can beat games that only create by the developers in days or weeks, but UNLIMITED EXPLORE is totally different. This game is endless – with players, there will be maps to explore. With more maps and contents to play, there will be more players, and create more and more game contents.



GAME FOR THE PLAYERS: With more and more maps and contents in our game, the gameplay of these contents will be different. You want to be a superman who can slay ten monsters with one hit, or step into a deadly trip only for hardcore players like you? It’s your choice, play what you want. IF you feel unhappy about a map, why not try some others? THERE’S ANYTHING TO FORCE YOU TO PLAY, AND YOU WILL GET WHAT YOU SEEK: HAVE FUN.






Will this game become a small, independent game, or become a great game, or even be a TRIPLE A? I can’t decide it. Only you can. If you love this concept, love a game for you, love freedom, doesn’t want to be played and need some fun when playing -- I need your support. If you don’t, I need your support too – you will find, or create something you want in the game.

Here are the goals, and ambitions of the game.

THE FATE OF UNLIMITED EXPLORE IS IN YOUR HANDS.

Notice: The requirment of these goals are calcualted by maximum requirments to make these functions ( to make sure we can build them if we got a certain amount of support ). No matter how much we get at last, we'll make the game in this order until we lost every cent.

I want to make something big, and don't you want to play something big, too?










①  : Office renting fee 20%; equipments (desks, chairs, PCs, etc.) 10%.

②  : Artists 10%; programmers 15%; designer(s) less than 5%(because I am a designer, and I will try to save every penny).

③  : PC platform PR(public relations) 7%; marketing employee(s) 3%; network ads 10%.

④  : Water, foods, pens, whiteboards, papers (including toilet papers, of course), electricity fees, air conditioners in summer, heaters in winter, balabalabala……




①  : Office renting fee 15%; equipments (desks, chairs, PCs, etc.) 5%.

②  : Artists 15%; programmers (about) 12%; designers (about) 8% [I’ll need some designers to help me, like action design and numerical design(in easy words, player and enemy status)].

③  : PC platform PR (public relations) 4%; marketing employees 4%; network ads 5%, outdoor TV ads 7%.

④  : Saying so much, and you want to hear something more? In this stage, due to increased employees, consumable supplies will cost more, too.




①  : Office renting fee 10%; equipments (desks, chairs, PCs, etc.) 5%. The costs increased by number, but decreased by percentage.

②  : Artists 8%; programmers 8%; designers 6%; others (like accountants, cleaners and receptionists) 3%.

③  : PC and consoles platform PR (public relations) 4%; marketing employees 3%; network ads 3%, TV ads 6%, billboard ads 4%.

④  : The costs of these things increased by number, but decreased by percentage, same as the cost of offices and employees.

⑤  : More gain, more pain; more funds, more taxes; more development time, more taxes too. Tax is the only thing calculated by percentage. It will only grows higher, and never low a bit.

⑥  : As I already said in the video, if we raised so much, we can make something cool and bring them into the game, and that’s costy, such as better physical effects, weather changes, motion capture (if funded so much), etc. These effects need time to research, or just buy others’ techs.



Adversity happens to all of us, and it happens all the time. I’ve been through a lot of challenges when I decided to quit from my office and create Unlimited Explore. I have no partners, no fame, no funds, and no family support (for a long time).

I have no fame, so no one will trust me if I only have some concept arts and throw them on the internet like some famous people. To prove the existence of Unlimited Explore and prove my abilities, I make an early version of the game, and nearly 60% of the Exploration Mode is completed by one man in half a year. These screenshots you see in this page are actually from this version.

I have no family support in a long time – everyone around me doesn’t support me. My family against me when I decided to be a game designer years ago, and they thought that I should get a work for the government – until now. My former colleagues invited me to make mobile games and F2P games but I refused. You can see this page now, because I have overcome these difficulties.

The last one, I have no funds. I can’t overcome this by myself; you know I can’t print money, right? That’s why I’m here – I need your help. I know what I am making, and my design documents will be ready soon. If the project is successfully funded, I will overcome other difficulties as well.

Please tell your friends and any other players about this game, and let them tell their friends – tell them Unlimited Explore will be a great game, and bring them to this page. Thank you very much!

Let us save, and play Unlimited Explore TOGETHER!

too – you will find, or create something you want in the game.
Here are the goals, and ambitions of the game. 
THE FATE OF UNLIMITED EXPLORE IS IN YOUR HANDS. 
Notice: The requirment of these goals are calcualted by maximum requirments to make these functions ( to make sure we can build them if we got a certain amount of support ). No matter how much we get at last, we'll make the game in this order until we lost every cent.I want to make something big, and don't you want to play something big, too?















① 
: Office renting fee 20%;
equipments (desks, chairs, PCs, etc.) 10%.
② 
: Artists 10%; programmers 15%;
designer(s) less than 5%(because I am a designer, and I will try to save every penny).
③ 
: PC platform PR(public
relations) 7%; marketing employee(s) 3%; network ads 10%.
④ 
: Water, foods, pens,
whiteboards, papers (including toilet papers, of course), electricity fees, air
conditioners in summer, heaters in winter, balabalabala……


① 
: Office renting fee 15%;
equipments (desks, chairs, PCs, etc.) 5%.
② 
: Artists 15%; programmers
(about) 12%; designers (about) 8% [I’ll need some designers to help me, like
action design and numerical design(in easy words, player and enemy status)].
③ 
: PC platform PR (public
relations) 4%; marketing employees 4%; network ads 5%, outdoor TV ads 7%.
④ 
: Saying so much, and you want
to hear something more? In this stage, due to increased employees, consumable
supplies will cost more, too.


① 
: Office renting fee 10%;
equipments (desks, chairs, PCs, etc.) 5%. The costs increased by number, but
decreased by percentage.
② 
: Artists 8%; programmers 8%;
designers 6%; others (like accountants, cleaners and receptionists) 3%.
③ 
: PC and consoles platform PR (public
relations) 4%; marketing employees 3%; network ads 3%, TV ads 6%, billboard ads
4%.
④ 
: The costs of these things
increased by number, but decreased by percentage, same as the cost of offices
and employees. 
⑤ 
: More gain, more pain; more
funds, more taxes; more development time, more taxes too. Tax is the only thing
calculated by percentage. It will only grows higher, and never low a bit.
⑥ 
: As I already said in the
video, if we raised so much, we can make something cool and bring them into the
game, and that’s costy, such as better physical effects, weather changes,
motion capture (if funded so much), etc. These effects need time to research, or
just buy others’ techs.


Adversity happens to all of us, and it happens all the time. I’ve
been through a lot of challenges when I decided to quit from my office and
create Unlimited Explore. I have no partners, no fame, no funds, and no family
support (for a long time).
I have no fame, so no one will trust me if I only have some
concept arts and throw them on the internet like some famous people. To prove the
existence of Unlimited Explore and prove my abilities, I make an early version
of the game, and nearly 60% of the Exploration Mode is completed by one man in
half a year. These screenshots you see in this page are actually from this
version. 
I have no family support in a long time – everyone around me doesn’t
support me. My family against me when I decided to be a game designer years
ago, and they thought that I should get a work for the government – until now. My
former colleagues invited me to make mobile games and F2P games but I refused.
You can see this page now, because I have overcome these difficulties. 
The last one, I have no funds. I can’t overcome this by myself;
you know I can’t print money, right? That’s why I’m here – I need your help. I
know what I am making, and my design documents will be ready soon. If the
project is successfully funded, I will overcome other difficulties as well.
Please tell your friends and any other players about this game, and
let them tell their friends – tell them Unlimited Explore will be a great game, and bring them to this page.
Thank you very much! 
Let us save, and play Unlimited Explore TOGETHER!

story:
What Is Gurgle?

Gurgle is a vorish trading card game that focuses on the struggle between predator and prey. As a dastardly meddler, you play around with the fate of a chosen few, satiating the hunger of your predators while protecting your prey from others like you. Life is just a game, so you may as well instigate a little conflict... Who cares if a few people get a little slobber on them, so long as you have fun!

In this game, you’ll be fitting your monsters and morsels with the means to take out your opponents’. Score 10 points before anyone else and you win. You score points when one of your predators devours someone, and you can use cards like actions and events to help them do so. But be careful--when a predator becomes full, it naturally has to gurgle its food away. Like a quick hibernation, this leaves it vulnerable to the antics of your foes. If you let your predators go too crazy, they might find themselves out of the action before you know it!

Don’t be afraid to play dirty. In fact, it’s encouraged!

To view the game's Quick Start Rules (WIP), click here. To view the game's Full Rules (WIP), click here.

This questionnaire is over, but feel free to click the link to check out the results!


Who Am I?

My pen name for this project is Shadecerule, who is also my flavorful fursona. I've kept my real identity a secret due to the mature nature of this game (you know, because of employers, crazy people from the Internet, and all that jazz), but here is a little bit about me. I'm a game designer who recently graduated from the Art Institute of Vancouver near the top of my class. During my time there, I underwent rigorous training in game design, programming, and playtesting. Other than Gurgle, I am working on a few nifty little Android games, but I hope to make more vore games in the future!

Gurgle began as a simple idea that I spurred up for fun. Once I realized my idea had potential, I decided to take the game to the next level and get serious. I've been working on it for the past three years and it's become a labor of love. Now, I want to release something that everyone in the vore fandom can enjoy. This game has taken a lot of hard work to get to this stage and I'm finally at the last stretch. That's why I've started this campaign: to bring it to you guys!


Where is Gurgle With Playtesting?

Gurgle has gone through loads of playtesting to get it to where it is now, but it still needs more. I'm presently putting together a digital platform to make for some quick and easy playtesting. I'll be using a program called LackeyCCG which allows me to create my own plugin with only a small amount of programming. If anyone would like to join me in some playtests once this gets up and running, feel free to shoot me an email! (Importantly, I must point out that this will not be a prototype for the digital version of the game! LackeyCCG will only be for playtesting. The digital version of Gurgle will be created more professionally with Unity 5.)

Where is Gurgle With the Digital Version?

At present, the digital version is still undergoing its technical design phase. I've been writing an entire document to flesh out the technical needs and functions the game requires; for instance, menu flowcharts and animation timings. It's approximately 80% complete but I need to do a little more playtesting before I can finalize the document. 

What Does Gurgle Need, and Why Fund It?

Gurgle is primarily a game that panders to those who are into vore. This is a big project and a very expensive endeavore (ahem), and so I need a lot of help from you: the community. I’ve designed about 300 cards for the first set and I have a few smaller sets planned out for the future. While this campaign is just to help me get the first set off the ground, 300 cards is still an expensive venture in terms of art. My goal is to commission many great artists from the community, but this will only be possible with your support. (If you'd like to see the artists I am interested in, here is a lovely little list for you to look at. Feel free to make suggestions for artists you'd like to see in the game!)

I’m asking for $15,000 so that I can afford to pay these lovely people for all that art. I project that $13,000 will go toward paying artists, and the rest will go toward backer perks, the Indiegogo fee and taxes, and a portion of the first batch of cards. The rest of the money I need to complete this project will come out of my own pocket. 

For those of you interested, here's a tasty pie chart that shows approximately where your support will go.


How Will Artists Be Paid?

Properly compensating artists is very important to me. I've heard so many stories about people not getting paid or getting taken advantage of, and I don't want this project to be one of those stories. 

Artists will be paid upfront before they even begin working. I intend on paying people their standard commission price for the assigned work, as well as a 15-20% licensing fee. I'm also offering the option to redeem perks that equal your commission price, and a combination of perks and payment. I'm always open to discussion!

One more note in response to a few popular questions: art will be licensed to me for use in my game, but the artist will still retain partial ownership of their created work. The owners of any characters involved in the art will also retain all ownership rights to their characters.


How Will Gurgle Be Distributed?

Gurgle will initially be released as a physical card game and then as a digital game. This is because once the game has been fully made, it is quite easy to release it as a physical product. The digital version of the game requires coding, more art assets, engine and server expenses, and a lot more time. I would also like to hire a team of talented folks to help me out so that it can be made as professionally as possible! That is why the digital version has been scheduled for release at a later date.

I will be publishing and distributing this game myself. I plan on ordering my cards and supplies through The Game Crafters, though I am also considering DriveThruCards. Other suggestions are also welcome! A few factors still need to be ironed out before concrete decisions can be made. At the present moment, the approximate expense of my first batch of cards (including materials like dice and rulebooks, as well as the physical backer perks) amounts to approximately $950. 


Perky Perks

Naturally, every good campaign has some snacks for its backers!

All perks stack, meaning that when you make a contribution, you will receive that perk and all the earlier perks. Also note that some perks have a limited availability. When they are no longer available, they will be removed from the list and can no longer be claimed. Make sure to get them before they're gone!

For those of you who select cameo and character slot perks, be warned: This game cannot accept characters that breach any copyright. If a character is under copyright, I must have permission from the owner of the intellectual property.

Additionally, those who are interested in cameo slots can look at this list to see what is available!


Stretch(y) Goals

A campaign needs to have some goals to stretch out those guts, right? Well, here they are!

$16,000 - All backers who contributed at least $25 will have a ticket entered in a raffle. Backers will have 1 additional ticket entered for every $10 contributed beyond $25, for a maximum of 10 tickets. First prize will have their perk tier upgraded to the $450 perk. If the winner has already reached the $450 perk tier, then they get all of those perks over again! Second prize will be awarded with a cameo slot in one of the cards. Third prize will receive one of each starter deck and three booster packs. The winners will be selected when the campaign ends and the prizes will ship with the rest of the perks.

$20,000 - When Gurgle enters its digital phase of production, a team of talented individuals will be hired to work on it. Production time is estimated to be 8-12 months and will begin 3-5 months after the end of this campaign. This game will be available on Windows, Linux, and Mac, and it will support 2-4 player matches over the Internet. It will be made in Unity 5 and it will be free to download and play! (While the digital version will be made with or without this goal, this goal will allow it to be made more quickly and more professionally.)


What Sets Are in Store For The Future

The first set I plan to release will be fairly vanilla to appeal to the broadest audience; only oral vore with minimal nudity. The set will cover many themes that come with the territory of vore while keeping it fairly clean (in the dirtiest of ways, of course). This campaign is only to get the first set off the ground, but I have plans to release many more sets to explore all facets of vore. Here's a little taste of what I have in store...

Just For the Playas : Soon after the first set is released, I'd like to begin working on this very special set. It will be composed of character cards that display the characters of the community: you guys!

Such Great Heights : The theme of this set will revolve around macros and micros. Get ready to romp, stomp, and chomp around town!

Unusual Feeding : While the other sets will have alternative vore in them, this set will focus exclusively on these alternative forms of vore: CV, AV, vampirism, tail vore, belly vore, breast vore, and so on. You'll see a whole variety of kinkier themes as well, like goo beasts and glorious tentacle porn!

Hold Onto Your Humanity! : While the first set of Gurgle will have a handful of human and demi-human characters, the majority of the cast will be furry. That is why this is a set that is only for humans!

Hark, a Piano! : Toony characters, vore jokes, and all sorts of silliness accompany this set. Watch out, 'cause it's raining pianos!


Prototype Cards

The game's rules are nearing their final draft and they are currently undergoing some rigorous playtesting. Check out some of the prototype cards!


Risks & Challenges

Besides getting eaten along the way, the most difficult part of finishing this game will be getting all of the art assets. As anyone who's familiar with them knows, trading card games are very art-heavy. A lot of money and effort goes into making the cards unique and appealing. If I can't raise enough money, completion of the game will be dragged out until all of the art can be assembled. But hey, that's why I've started this campaign!

I would also like to note that even if this campaign does not reach its goal, Gurgle will remain in production until finished. This will require more time for me to amass my own personal funds for art, and so the release of Gurgle will merely be postponed until then.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to support this project but can't afford to throw your money at me, you can still help by spreading the word! The more people who know about this project, the merrier. If you're an artist who is interested in providing art for this game (whether by donation or through commission), that would be incredible and I would love to get in contact with you. You can reach me at gurgletcg@hotmail.com and I'll get back to you as soon as I can. Additionally, I'd also like to compensate art donors with campaign perks equivalent to your commission prices! If you're interested, don't hesitate to bring it up.


Thank You So Much!

story:
What is it all about?

The campaign is about give a chance to a young Belgian team to participate to the contest, Oculus Mobile Jam, without running into debt !

This world contest is going to last 4 weeks: 13 April to the 11 May

Participate to this contest is going to cost us a lot:
- Four people working on the project full time instead of earning money;
- Not be able to share time with our love one during 4 weeks;
- The cost of the ride to go work in one place all together;
- The hardware we are going to put in place: server, website...;
- The junk food we will have to buy to win time and work more;
- The governmental administration problems of not working during a month;
- ...

Participate to this contest is going to cost to the group much much more that 2000€* !  It could lead some of the team to have big trouble.

But even then, we are going to participate and create something awesome.
Why ? We have the skills, the will power and the heart to do it well !

That why we need to be funded: to protect us if things go wrong.


Support us and share about us. 
We won't disappoint you.

Contest information


“This year, participants are challenged to build groundbreaking new content with the Gear VR Innovator Edition. This is an opportunity to collaborate with fellow developers, with $1,000,000 cash in awards and prizes for the best new VR games, apps, and experiences. For each weekly milestone, each entry l have its progress available for view, so you’ll also be able to give and receive valuable feedback.”


Our two Partners

We want to win this contest.
So we asked  one of the biggest game company in Belgium to be our partner.
They are going to help us with regular advises in intend to as ensure the best quality of our final product.


We also asked the support of Technocité that is a formation center on Mons.
They provide all kind  of new technologies formations.
As six of us has been trained by them to work in the video game industry.
It was an implicit choose for us to have them by our side.


What is a Gear VR  and  the Oculus Rift ?

The Oculus is the next big thing.  It is a device that instead of making you play a game, bring you inside the game literally. It is a pretty crazy thing.
More information here : https://www.oculus.com/rift/

The Gear VR has the same concept as the Oculus but is designed for the mobile market.


 

What do we need ?

  • Galaxy Note 4 : 674,90 €

  • Gear VR: $213.49 + 144$ (US-EU fee - Third for us shipping)

  • A working place : 300 €

  • Transport help: 100-800 € *

  • Extra cost: 100 €

* The idea is to reduce the cost of car ride for those of the team that come regularly on the working place and work on the game.

That’s why we ask for 2000 €.

What if  the community, you, give us more?

First we would be delighted and honored of you trust in our group.

And most of the money is going to be used to work some weeks more after the jam:
- Create an Oculus Rift version for PC;
- Go to convention and make people enjoy the game;
- Continue the game after the contest;

What are we going to do if we win ?

If the team win a gold or silver prizes, 100 000$ - 50 000$, Spinning Heads won't be a team anymore but will be a video game studio for virtual reality development!

The team: Spinning Heads

We are a Belgian team gather specially for this contest.
We are ten game creators: artists, developers, sound designers…

We all have an uninterrupted strong will to work in the video game industry.
Added together, we have more then 40 years of game development experiences in the team!

About the leader ?

My name is Strée Eloi. I was a backer of the first Oculus Kickstart campaign.
That day, I decided to be a game developer for the rest of my life.

Since then, I have done a lot of games and prototypes !
I tries to merge the Oculus Rift to any devices.

Here is an example with Oculus and the old Microsoft kinect:

I participated to numerous 48 hours Jam , for the best known:


I also did the VR Jam 2013 that had lasted 3 weeks long:



What is a game jam ?


A classic game jam is a meeting of game creators that meet at one place during generally 48 hours. The idea is to create innovating game with no limit except time and a subject given. Here is a example of a game that some of us developed at the ZooMachine.


(This time the game jam is going to last 4 weeks and result on a real product !)


The Bonus Game !

First of all, we are Belgian a country renowned for his chocolate but also his beers.
And as we wanted  to give you something back.
We have created a game for you : The Lost Beer !


"The story of a beer lost in space trying to make his way to Palmer Lucky, funder of Oculus Rift, with the dream to ask him a question: At when a customer release?"


We want the game to be a kind of game credits for the contest we are going to live.
 So we decided to make you the backer the element of this game.

A game where your names, your tweets  are the game !


   Please enjoy and share !
story_txt:
What is it all about?The campaign is about give a chance to a young Belgian team to participate to the contest, Oculus Mobile Jam, without running into debt !This world contest is going to last 4 weeks: 13 April to the 11 MayParticipate to this contest is going to cost us a lot:- Four people working on the project full time instead of earning money;- Not be able to share time with our love one during 4 weeks;- The cost of the ride to go work in one place all together;- The hardware we are going to put in place: server, website...;- The junk food we will have to buy to win time and work more;- The governmental administration problems of not working during a month; - ...Participate to this contest is going to cost to the group much much more that 2000€* !  It could lead some of the team to have big trouble.But even then, we are going to participate and create something awesome.Why ? We have the skills, the will power and the heart to do it well ! 
That why we need to be funded: to protect us if things go wrong.

Support us and share about us.  We won't disappoint you.Contest information“This year, participants are challenged to build groundbreaking new content with the Gear VR Innovator Edition. This is an opportunity to collaborate with fellow developers, with $1,000,000 cash in awards and prizes for the best new VR games, apps, and experiences. For each weekly milestone, each entry l have its progress available for view, so you’ll also be able to give and receive valuable feedback.” Our two PartnersWe want to win this contest. So we asked  one of the biggest game company in Belgium to be our partner.They are going to help us with regular advises in intend to as ensure the best quality of our final product.We also asked the support of Technocité that is a formation center on Mons.They provide all kind  of new technologies formations. As six of us has been trained by them to work in the video game industry.It was an implicit choose for us to have them by our side.What is a Gear VR  and  the Oculus Rift ?The
 Oculus is the next big thing.  It is a device that instead of making 
you play a game, bring you inside the game literally. It is a pretty 
crazy thing.More information here : https://www.oculus.com/rift/The Gear VR has the same concept as the Oculus but is designed for the mobile market. What do we need ?
Galaxy Note 4 : 674,90 €
Gear VR: $213.49 + 144$ (US-EU fee - Third for us shipping)
A working place : 300 €
Transport help: 100-800 € *
Extra cost: 100 €
* The idea is to reduce the cost of car ride for those of the team that come regularly on the working place and work on the game.That’s why we ask for 2000 €.What if  the community, you, give us more?
First we would be delighted and honored of you trust in our group.And most of the money is going to be used to work some weeks more after the jam:- Create an Oculus Rift version for PC;- Go to convention and make people enjoy the game;- Continue the game after the contest;What are we going to do if we win ?
If the team win a gold or silver prizes, 100 000$ - 50 000$, Spinning Heads won't be a team anymore but will be a video game studio for virtual reality development! The team: Spinning HeadsWe are a Belgian team gather specially for this contest.We are ten game creators: artists, developers, sound designers…We all have an uninterrupted strong will to work in the video game industry.Added together, we have more then 40 years of game development experiences in the team!About the leader ? My name is Strée Eloi. I was a backer of the first Oculus Kickstart campaign.That day, I decided to be a game developer for the rest of my life.Since then, I have done a lot of games and prototypes !I tries to merge the Oculus Rift to any devices.Here is an example with Oculus and the old Microsoft kinect:I participated to numerous 48 hours Jam , for the best known:I also did the VR Jam 2013 that had lasted 3 weeks long:What is a game jam ?A classic game jam is a 
meeting of game creators that meet at one place during generally 48 
hours. The idea is to create innovating game with no limit except time 
and a subject given. Here is a example of a game that some of us developed at the 
ZooMachine.(This time the game jam is going to last 4 weeks and result on a real product !)The Bonus Game !First of all, we are Belgian a country renowned for his chocolate but also his beers.And as we wanted  to give you something back.We have created a game for you : The Lost Beer !"The story of a beer lost in space trying to make his way to Palmer Lucky, funder of Oculus Rift,
 with the dream to ask him a question: At when a customer release?"We want the game to be a kind of game credits for the contest we are going to live. So we decided to make you the backer the element of this game.A game where your names, your tweets  are the game !   Please enjoy and share !

story:
Quién es Vane?

Vanessa Vargas es la primera mujer y más graduada del país en Cinturón Morado de Brazilian Jiu Jitsu,  Entrena BJJ hace 6 años, ha peleado en más de 14 torneos  dentro y fuera del país, terminando siempre entre los primeros 3 lugares, entre sus conquistas se encuentra el haber ganado la medalla de oro en el IBJJF en Panamá.
En este momento se encuentra preparandose para debutar a nivel profesional en MMA, campo en el cuál ya cuenta con su primer pelea ganada.
Vanessa es una Costarricense que con mucho esfuerzo, horas de entrenamiento, y disciplina ha logrado crecer en este gran deporte convirtiendose en un ejemplo para todas y todos los deportistas que sin apoyo económico externo logran crecer y hacerse un nombre a nivel internacional.

Que necesita nuestra atléta?

En detalle, lo que Vane necesita son $800 para poder pagar su tiquete aéreo y algunos gastos, para lo cual es importante mencionar lo siguiente:

  • Habrá 100% de transparencia en la utilización de los fondos ya que por este mismo medio te estaremos dando acceso a todos los comprobantes de gastos.
  • Al ser una de las personas que apoya esta causa vas a tener la posibilidad de disfrutar de clases gratuitas de BJJ, cenas y otros premios.

Otras formas de ayudar

Agradecemos cualquier tipo de apoyo que nos puedas brindar, por ejemplo contactos con patrocinadores, indumentaria, presencia en medios de comunicación y social media, en fin, cualquier aporte se agradece y es bienvenido.

story:
An heirloom game, resurrected.

A year ago, Randy Miller (my dad) and I convinced ourselves that the modern board game community was ready for a dose of the ancient. In 1979, New Hampshire artist Randy had put together a 2-person strategy game called Celtic Realm (pictured above,) based on the traditional game of Senet, with a theme inspired by the 1st century Book of Kells. He'd sold out of the game by the mid '90s. A year after our conversation started, here's where we stand:

  • Celtic Realm: Second Edition's various components are in pre-production or production, right here in the USA.
  • 165 games are earmarked for backers from our successful Kickstarter campaign.
  • We are eager to share this classic-in-the-making with the Indiegogo community.
  • We need your help reaching our reward goal of 200 games!
  • We have awesome, functional, prototype proofs of all game components. (See video and images below.)

Board and checker detail

Zinc metal dice

Low resolution proof of game Box design.

Dice prototype detail showing relative size.

Our Sticker Perk, showing colors as they appear in the color side of this edition of the game board.

 

Curious about how to play Celtic Realm? See an example game (played with first edition components) here:

 

 

 

What we need, What you'll get, and What's at stake

  • We have a funding goal of $650- why so small? Well, we are looking to build a rainy day fund for Celtic Realm. Anything we raise at this point will help us put the finishing touches on our first production run of 700 games. We believe in the crowdfunding process, and we're excited to show you our work. 
  • Here's the best part- for $65, you can reserve your very own crowdfunded copy of Celtic Realm 2!
  • So what's at stake? Well, one way or another this game will reach the market- but how we get there is crucial. By spreading awareness (and copies of Celtic Realm itself) through Indiegogo, we are keeping the game as magically independent and authentic as it can be. And that makes us feel good. By contributing to our quest, you are giving our independent game company, Owl Tree Games, a boost it needs to get Celtic Realm 2 out into the world. Won't you consider reserving your copy in support of this dream?
 

What's another way to help?

  • Know any classic strategy game enthusiasts? Lovers of Celtic culture and arts? Let them know what you just discovered on Indiegogo!
  • Share this campaign around, and help a family dream come true!
